FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the animated coffin is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the coffin move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the coffin is animate.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The animated coffin can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The animated coffin makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Entrap.name: Entrap
Entrap.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, if the target is not an Undead, the target has the restrained condition and takes 14 (4d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. The animated coffin can grapple only one creature at a time.

AuraofDeath.name: Aura of Death
AuraofDeath.description: Creatures within 30 feet of Skall have disadvantage on death saving throws.

CosmicAnnihilation.name: Cosmic Annihilation
CosmicAnnihilation.description: A creature killed by Skall can be restored to life only by means of a true resurrection or wish spell.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If Skall fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Skall dies, he turns to dust. If his orrery of souls hasn't been destroyed, Skall re-forms within the Mortuary in 1d10 days. He appears within 5 feet of the orrery.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: Skall has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Skall makes one Withering Touch attack or uses Spellcasting. He also uses Death Knell twice.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: ms 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (6d8 + 5) cold damage plus 31 (7d8) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of Skall's next turn.

DeathKnell.name: DeathKnell
DeathKnell.description: Skall points his finger at a creature he can see within 120 feet of himself, filling the target's mind with visions of death and the plangent toll of an iron bell. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage and have the frightened condition until the start of Skall's next turn.

FogofDeath(1/Day).name: FogofDeath(1/Day)
FogofDeath(1/Day).description: Skall exudes a killing fog in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on himself. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. The fog lasts until the start of Skall's next turn, and it can't be dispersed by wind. It does not move with him.

IncorruptibleVessel.name: Incorruptible Vessel
IncorruptibleVessel.description: The exorcist can't be possessed by Celestials, Fiends, or Undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The exorcist makes two Grave Burst attacks.

GraveBurst.name: GraveBurst
GraveBurst.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) necrotic or radiant damage (exorcist's choice).

AdmitEntity{@recharge5}.name: AdmitEntity{@recharge5}
AdmitEntity{@recharge5}.description: The exorcist thins the veil of death for a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself, exposing the target to malevolent entities. The target must make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 (8d8) psychic damage and has the incapacitated condition for 1 minute, during which time it retches and babbles incoherently in a voice that is not its own. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. An incapacitated target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The icon has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The icon makes two Slam attacks and uses Fiery Eruption.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

FieryEruption.name: FieryEruption
FieryEruption.description: dex DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the icon. {@actSaveFail} 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

DiabolicWard.name: Diabolic Ward
DiabolicWard.description: Attack rolls against the devil have Disadvantage|XPHB. If the devil makes an attack roll, this trait is suppressed until the start of its next turn.

DiabolicalRestoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
DiabolicalRestoration.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Nine Hells.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The devil has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The devil makes two attacks, using Infernal Blade or Confounding Ray in any combination.

InfernalBlade.name: InfernalBlade
InfernalBlade.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage and 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

ConfoundingRay.name: ConfoundingRay
ConfoundingRay.description: r 5, range 120 ft. on hit: 13 (2d12) Psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't make Opportunity Attacks until the start of the devil's next turn.

CompellingContract(1/Day).name: CompellingContract(1/Day)
CompellingContract(1/Day).description: cha DC 14, one creature within 30 feet of the devil. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Charmed|XPHB condition. While it is Charmed|XPHB, it has the Stunned|XPHB condition, except the target can speak. If the target agrees to the devil's contract, the effect ends. Otherwise, the target repeats the save whenever it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

DiabolicalRestoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
DiabolicalRestoration.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Nine Hells.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The devil has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The devil makes two Thundering Halberd attacks.

ThunderingHalberd.name: ThunderingHalberd
ThunderingHalberd.description: m 9, reach 10 ft. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Thunder damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MistyEscape.name: Misty Escape
MistyEscape.description: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB outside its resting place, the vampire uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).name: Multiattack(VampireFormOnly)
Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).description: The vampire makes two Hellfire Claw attacks and uses Bite.

HellfireClaw(VampireFormOnly).name: HellfireClaw(VampireFormOnly)
HellfireClaw(VampireFormOnly).description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 17) from one of two claws.

Bite(ImporVampireFormOnly).name: Bite(ImporVampireFormOnly)
Bite(ImporVampireFormOnly).description: con DC 18, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled|XPHB, Incapacitated|XPHB, or Restrained|XPHB condition. {@actSaveFail} 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) Necrotic damage and the creature loses its highest-level available spell slot (if any). The target's Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points|XPHB equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a Vampire Spawn under the vampire's control.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The vampire has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and uses Bite or Guardian's Command.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 16) from one of two claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: con DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled|XPHB, Incapacitated|XPHB, or Restrained|XPHB condition. {@actSaveFail} 7 (1d4 + 5) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points|XPHB equal to that amount.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ancient deep crow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the ancient deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ancient deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

Mandibles.name: Mandibles
Mandibles.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the ancient deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

ShadowCaw.name: ShadowCaw
ShadowCaw.description: The ancient deep crow releases an ear-splitting caw. Each creature within 60 feet of the crow and able to hear it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Auspicia makes two attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Brahma has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

Taunt(2/Day).name: Taunt
Taunt(2/Day).description: Brahma can use a bonus action to target one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can hear Brahma, it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Brahma's next turn.

WarLute.name: WarLute
WarLute.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

SongofDomination(3/Day).name: SongofDomination(3/Day)
SongofDomination(3/Day).description: Brahma targets one creature that can see or hear her, which must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by her for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. It has disadvantage on these saves if being charmed by Brahma is something the target openly or secretly desires. For 1 hour after the charm effect ends, the target has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma checks made as part of a contest with Brahma.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The chaos quadrapod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The chaos quadrapod makes up to two tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The chaos quadrapod can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

ChaosCloud(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: ChaosCloud(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Chaos Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

ChaosCloud(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: The chaos quadrapod shoots forth a knot of roiling ethereal light that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The deep crow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the deep crow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

Mandibles.name: Mandibles
Mandibles.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

ChampionChallenge(RechargesafteraShortor.name: Champion Challenge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
ChampionChallenge(RechargesafteraShortor.description: As a bonus action, Donaar causes each creature of his choice that he can see within 30 feet of him to make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature can't willingly move more than 30 feet away from Donaar. This effect ends on the creature if Donaar is incapacitated or dies, or if the creature is moved more than 30 feet away from him.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Donaar makes two attacks with his greatsword or his whip.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. Whenever Donaar rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Whip.name: Whip
Whip.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

AcidVomit.name: AcidVomit
AcidVomit.description: Donaar regurgitates acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Jim carries a wand of wonder.

BenignTransportation(RechargesafterJimCa.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after Jim Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
BenignTransportation(RechargesafterJimCa.description: As a bonus action, Jim teleports up to 30 feet to a space he can see. The space must be unoccupied or occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature. If the latter, Jim and the willing creature both teleport, swapping places.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MinorConjuration.name: MinorConjuration
MinorConjuration.description: Jim conjures an inanimate object, no larger than 3 feet on a side and no more than 10 pounds, in his hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space he can see within 10 feet of him. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet. It disappears if it takes any damage, after 1 hour, or when Jim uses this feature again.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: K'thriss wears a robe of stars (accounted for in his statistics). The robe allows him to cast the following spells: 6/day: magic missile (7 missiles)

AwakenedMind.name: Awakened Mind
AwakenedMind.description: K'thriss can telepathically speak to any creature he can see within 30 feet of him, provided the creature can understand at least one language.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: K'thriss has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep. Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, K'thriss has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: K'thriss makes two attacks with his sickle.

Sickle.name: Sickle
Sickle.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

CustomizableStorage.name: Customizable Storage
CustomizableStorage.description: A keg robot can hold up to three types of liquid payload totaling 12 gallons within its hollow, barrel-shaped body. A full keg robot can make one liquid attack per gallon before the liquid must be refilled. Filling a keg robot takes 2 rounds per gallon. Differing payloads can alter the keg robot's attacks from those presented here.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

AcidSquirt.name: AcidSquirt
AcidSquirt.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) acid damage.

BeerShower.name: BeerShower
BeerShower.description: The keg robot spews an unnaturally potent beer in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature has its speed halved by exposure to the potent brew. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

HotOilSpray{@recharge5}.name: HotOilSpray{@recharge5}
HotOilSpray{@recharge5}.description: The keg robot sprays hot oil in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 (1d8 + 3) fire damage and falls prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall prone.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Mrgn has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mrgn makes three attacks with her scimitars or her longbow.

Scimitars.name: Scimitars
Scimitars.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: Oak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Oak makes three attacks with his hooked daggers or his hand crossbow.

HookedDagger.name: HookedDagger
HookedDagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

DivineStrike.name: Divine Strike
DivineStrike.description: Once on each of his turns when he hits a creature with a weapon attack, Omin can cause the attack to deal an extra 4 (1d8) damage of the same type dealt by the weapon.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Omin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Omin makes two attacks with his maul.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

EchoSpell(1/Day).name: Echo Spell
EchoSpell(1/Day).description: Pendragon can cast the spell he cast on his last turn, whose casting time becomes 1 bonus action. This bonus casting uses a spell slot as normal.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

DivineDisplay(1/Day).name: Divine Display
DivineDisplay(1/Day).description: As a bonus action, Phoenix causes his shield to flare with divine light. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Phoenix makes two melee attacks.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Portentia deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Portentia that isn't incapacitated and Portentia doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Portentia makes three melee attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Portentia magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (her choice). In a new form, Portentia retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks.

DivineEminence.name: Divine Eminence
DivineEminence.description: As a bonus action, Prophetess can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Prophetess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Prophetess has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Rosie has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

HalflingNimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
HalflingNimbleness.description: Rosie can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Rosie is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

ShadowStep.name: Shadow Step
ShadowStep.description: When Rosie is in dim light or darkness, she can use a bonus action to teleport 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is also in dim light or darkness. She then has advantage on the first melee attack she makes before the end of the turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rosie makes three attacks, then makes two unarmed strike attacks.

StaffoftheMaster(+1Quarterstaff).name: StaffoftheMaster(+1Quarterstaff)
StaffoftheMaster(+1Quarterstaff).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Rosie's unarmed strikes are magical.

DefensiveAdvantage.name: Defensive Advantage
DefensiveAdvantage.description: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not incapacitated, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: Splugoth can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

TouchofMadness.name: Touch of Madness
TouchofMadness.description: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

WordFromBeyond(1/Day).name: WordFromBeyond(1/Day)
WordFromBeyond(1/Day).description: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Viari is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

Second-StoryWork.name: Second-Story Work
Second-StoryWork.description: Climbing does not cost Viari extra movement. Additionally, when he makes a running jump, the distance he covers increases by 5 feet.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Viari deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Viari that isn't incapacitated and Viari doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Viari makes two attacks with his shortsword and two attacks with his rapier.

+1Shortsword.name: +1Shortsword
+1Shortsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Walnut has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

MaskoftheWild.name: Mask of the Wild
MaskoftheWild.description: Walnut can attempt to hide even when she is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

WildShape(RechargesafteraShortorLongrest.name: Wild Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
WildShape(RechargesafteraShortorLongrest.description: As a bonus action, Walnut can assume the shape of a dire wolf. She can stay in this form for 3 hours or until she reverts to her normal form as a bonus action. She automatically reverts if she falls unconscious, drops to 0 hit points, or dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Walnut makes two attacks with Foremother or her longbow.

Foremother(+1Scimitar).name: Foremother(+1Scimitar)
Foremother(+1Scimitar).description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

SunlightVulnerability.name: Sunlight Vulnerability
SunlightVulnerability.description: While in sunlight, the snake has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. When the snake begins its turn in sunlight, it immediately suffers 10 radiant damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the snake to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the snake drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with a constrict attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained and the snake cannot constrict another target.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hamish makes two attacks with his axe or throws two rocks.

Axe.name: Axe
Axe.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

FeedonPain(2/Day).name: Feed on Pain
FeedonPain(2/Day).description: The first time she hits with a weapon attack on her turn, Kyrilla can deal an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage to the target and regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If she fails a saving throw, Kyrilla can choose to succeed instead.

PetrifyingGaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
PetrifyingGaze.description: When a creature that can see Kyrilla's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Kyrilla can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if Kyrilla isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Kyrilla has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kyrilla makes one attack to constrict and two attacks with her claws, or she makes three attacks with her longbow.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Kyrilla can't constrict another target.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage.

SummonSwarmofPoisonousSnakes{@recharge5}.name: SummonSwarmofPoisonousSnakes{@recharge5}
SummonSwarmofPoisonousSnakes{@recharge5}.description: Kyrilla conjures a swarm of poisonous snakes into an empty space within 10 feet of her. The swarm is under Kyrilla's control and acts on her turn, immediately after her in the initiative order.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes two attacks with its claws.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) slashing damage.

WaveofBones{@recharge5}.name: WaveofBones{@recharge5}
WaveofBones{@recharge5}.description: The horror crashes into foes like a wave before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the horror must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked prone.

InspiredCourage.name: Inspired Courage
InspiredCourage.description: The mercenary has advantage on savings throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while within 5 feet of at least one ally.

MartialAdvantage.name: Martial Advantage
MartialAdvantage.description: Once per turn, the mercenary can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the mercenary that isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mercenary makes two longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Tyreus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

IllusoryReality.name: Illusory Reality
IllusoryReality.description: When Tyreus casts an illusion spell of 1st level or higher, he can choose one inanimate, nonmagical object that is part of the illusion and make that object real. He can do this on his turn as a bonus action while the spell is ongoing.

Displacement(RechargesafterTyreusCastsan.name: Displacement (Recharges after Tyreus Casts an Illusion Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
Displacement(RechargesafterTyreusCastsan.description: As a bonus action, Tyreus projects an illusion that makes him appear to be standing a few inches from his actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against Tyreus. The effect ends if Tyreus takes damage, he is incapacitated, or his speed becomes 0.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

ModifyIllusion.name: ModifyIllusion
ModifyIllusion.description: When Tyreus casts an illusion spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer, he can use his action to change the nature of that illusion (using the spell's normal parameters for the illusion), provided that he can see the illusion.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the horror fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

ShadowStride.name: Shadow Stride
ShadowStride.description: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Medium or larger creature or object.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

LashingShadows{@recharge5}.name: LashingShadows{@recharge5}
LashingShadows{@recharge5}.description: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 36 (8d8) necrotic damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The usagt's true form is invisible.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The usagt can use its action to polymorph into a Small, Medium, or Large humanoid it has seen in person or telepathically, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. While polymorphed, the usagt is not invisible. Its new form appears to wear clothes, carry equipment, and even wield weapons, but these are all parts of the usagt itself; they vanish if dropped or removed from the creature. It can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its apparent equipment. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The usagt makes two attacks with its claws.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 11 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage.

PersonalInsight.name: PersonalInsight
PersonalInsight.description: The usagt targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the usagt's Wisdom (Insight) check.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The aartuk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aartuk makes two Branch attacks, two Radiant Pellet attacks, or one of each.

Branch.name: Branch
Branch.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 15-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air.

Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) cold damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

Flyby.description: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Tail.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) cold damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. Tail.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a flashing mote of radiant energy that travels to a point the dragon can see within 240 feet of itself, then blossoms into a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: The elf wears a suit of elven chain.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The elf doesn't require sleep.

RadiantBeam(3/Day).description: A magical beam of radiance flashes out from the elf's hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

RainofRadiance.description: Magical, flame-like radiance rains down on a creature that the elf can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

Malfunction.name: Malfunction
Malfunction.description: Whenever the autognome takes 15 damage or more from a single source and isn't reduced to 0 hit points by that damage, roll a d20 to determine if it suffers a malfunction:

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The autognome makes two Shock attacks.

Shock.name: Shock
Shock.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The b'rohg makes four Fist attacks or two Rock attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 5 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

HideousRend.name: HideousRend
HideousRend.description: The b'rohg uses all four of its hands to target one Large or smaller creature it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the b'rohg can't make Fist attacks or Rock attacks, and the target takes 49 (8d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped into four pieces.

IntellectFortress.name: Intellect Fortress
IntellectFortress.description: The braxat's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The braxat makes two Greatclub attacks.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

AcidBreath{@recharge}.name: AcidBreath{@recharge}
AcidBreath{@recharge}.description: The braxat exhales a 15-foot cone of acid. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 26 (4d12) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The scavver doesn't require air.

SwallowingBite.name: SwallowingBite
SwallowingBite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the scavver. The scavver can have one creature swallowed at a time.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The chwinga doesn't require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a tiny pile of moondust, a cloud of glittering spores, a statuette resembling its former self, a chunk of ice, or a sponge shaped like a dodecahedron (DM's choice).

MagicalGift(1/Day).name: MagicalGift(1/Day)
MagicalGift(1/Day).description: The chwinga targets a Humanoid it can see within 5 feet of itself. The target gains a supernatural charm|rewards|type=charm of the DM's choice. See chapter 7|DMG|7|Other Rewards for more information on supernatural charms.

NaturalShelter.name: NaturalShelter
NaturalShelter.description: The chwinga takes shelter inside a rock, a bush, a tree, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while it is magically protected in this way, and the shelter doesn't impair the chwinga's blindsight. The chwinga can use its action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter's space, but is otherwise unharmed.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the horror fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The horror doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d6 + 8) piercing damage.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the horror can't use this tentacle against other targets. The horror has 1d8 + 1 tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

PsychicWhispers{@recharge5}.name: PsychicWhispers{@recharge5}
PsychicWhispers{@recharge5}.description: The horror emits dreadful whispers in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in the sphere that isn't an Aberration must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Merging.name: Merging
Merging.description: Two dohwars can have a telepathic conversation with each other and a third willing creature of their choice, provided all three are within 30 feet of one another.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

Bioluminescence.name: Bioluminescence
Bioluminescence.description: While it has at least 1 hit point, the esthetic sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet, and its interior compartments are dimly lit.

Spelljamming.name: Spelljamming
Spelljamming.description: The esthetic has the properties of a spelljamming helm (see the Astral Adventurer's Guide), but only its reigar creator can attune to it.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The esthetic doesn't require air, food, or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The esthetic makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the creature takes 18 (4d8) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the esthetic can't use this tentacle against other targets. The esthetic has 1d4  2 tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

AntimagicGullet.name: Antimagic Gullet
AntimagicGullet.description: Magical effects, including those produced by spells and magic items but excluding those created by artifacts or deities, are suppressed inside the eye monger's gullet. Any spell slot or charge expended by a creature in the gullet to cast a spell or activate a property of a magic item is wasted. While an effect is suppressed, it doesn't function, but the time it spends suppressed counts against its duration. No spell or magical effect that originates outside the eye monger's gullet, except one created by an artifact or a deity, can affect a creature or an object inside the gullet.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the eye monger is motionless and has its eye and mouth closed at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the eye monger move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the eye monger is animate.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The eye monger doesn't require air.

blindsight.name: blindsight
blindsight.value: 120 ft. while the eye monger's eye is closed

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the eye monger and deposited in the eye monger's gullet (see Antimagic Gullet). The eye monger can swallow one creature at a time. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside the eye monger, and takes 35 (10d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The feyr doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The feyr makes one Frightful Bite attack and one Tentacle attack.

FrightfulBite.name: FrightfulBite
FrightfulBite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the feyr that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the feyr until the end of the feyr's next turn.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the feyr can't use this tentacle against other targets. The feyr has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one creature.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The feyr becomes invisible until it attacks, uses Nightmare Fuel, or uses a bonus action to become visible.

NightmareFuel(1/Day).name: NightmareFuel(1/Day)
NightmareFuel(1/Day).description: The feyr targets one unconscious creature it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage, and the feyr gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gaj makes one Mandibles attack and uses Mind-Probing Antennae or Paralyze (if available).

Mandibles.name: Mandibles
Mandibles.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage at the start of each of the gaj's turns. While it is grappling a creature, the gaj can't use its mandibles to attack other creatures.

Mind-ProbingAntennae.name: Mind-ProbingAntennae
Mind-ProbingAntennae.description: The gaj targets one creature grappled by it. The target must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage, and the gaj magically pulls one piece of information from the target's mind that the gaj wants to know. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the gaj learns nothing.

Paralyze{@recharge}.name: Paralyze{@recharge}
Paralyze{@recharge}.description: The gaj magically targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

FirearmsKnowledge.name: Firearms Knowledge
FirearmsKnowledge.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

SteadyasSheGoes.name: Steady as She Goes
SteadyasSheGoes.description: On the deck of a ship, the giff has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone or shove it overboard.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giff makes two Longsword or Musket attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Musket.name: Musket
Musket.description: rw 4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

ForceGrenade.name: ForceGrenade
ForceGrenade.description: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the grenade, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more grenades to throw.

FirearmsKnowledge.name: Firearms Knowledge
FirearmsKnowledge.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

HeadfirstCharge.name: Headfirst Charge
HeadfirstCharge.description: If the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line and ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The giff deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giff makes two Greatsword or Musket attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Musket.name: Musket
Musket.description: rw 5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d12 + 2) piercing damage.

ThunderBomb.name: ThunderBomb
ThunderBomb.description: The giff lights a grapefruit-sized bomb and throws it at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes. Each creature within a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the bomb, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more bombs to throw.

FirearmsKnowledge.name: Firearms Knowledge
FirearmsKnowledge.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the giff fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giff makes two Morningstar attacks.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Double-BarreledMusket.name: Double-BarreledMusket
Double-BarreledMusket.description: rw 6 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d12 + 2) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githyanki makes two Greatsword or Telekinetic Bolt attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

TelekineticBolt.name: TelekineticBolt
TelekineticBolt.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githyanki makes three Astral Bolt attacks.

AstralBolt.name: AstralBolt
AstralBolt.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) radiant damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The githyanki makes three Staff attacks, three Telekinetic Bolt attacks, or a combination thereof.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.

TelekineticBolt.name: TelekineticBolt
TelekineticBolt.description: rs 8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The scavver doesn't require air.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature that is missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: If it isn't incapacitated or wearing heavy armor, the hadozee can extend its skin membranes to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hadozee makes two Shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Musket.name: Musket
Musket.description: rw 5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: If it isn't incapacitated or wearing heavy armor, the hadozee can extend its skin membranes to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: If it isn't incapacitated or wearing heavy armor, the hadozee can extend its skin membranes to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hadozee makes two Shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

SpelljammerOverload.name: Spelljammer Overload
SpelljammerOverload.description: If the leech is reduced to 0 hit points while attached to a ship that has a spelljamming helm, the creature attuned to that helm must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (4d4) psychic damage and is incapacitated for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The leech doesn't require air or sleep.

SpikedTentacle.name: SpikedTentacle
SpikedTentacle.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The kindori doesn't require food, drink, or air.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

ColdBreath{@recharge5}.name: ColdBreath{@recharge5}
ColdBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a blast of frost in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 13 (3d8) cold damage, and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The megapede makes one Bite attack and uses either Life Drain or Psychic Bomb.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) poison damage.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: The megapede magically drains life energy from other creatures nearby. Each creature within 15 feet of the megapede must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

PsychicBomb.name: PsychicBomb
PsychicBomb.description: The megapede targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (5d8) psychic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

MercaneTelepathy.name: Mercane Telepathy
MercaneTelepathy.description: The mercane can communicate telepathically with any other mercane it knows, regardless of the distance between them.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mercane makes three Psi-Imbued Blade attacks.

Psi-ImbuedBlade.name: Psi-ImbuedBlade
Psi-ImbuedBlade.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the mercane until the end of the target's next turn.

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: When the comet drops to 0 hit points, it explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The comet doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The comet sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The comet deals double damage to objects and structures.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The comet doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The comet makes one Slam attack and one Spit Fire attack.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

SpitFire.name: SpitFire
SpitFire.description: rw 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) fire damage.

BrainDump.name: Brain Dump
BrainDump.description: Whenever the neh-thalggu consumes a brain, it gains the magical ability to speak and understand languages known by the brain's previous owner.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The neh-thalggu doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The neh-thalggu makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid. on hit: 35 (10d6) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the neh-thalggu kills the target by extracting and consuming its brain.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The neh-thalggu magically emits psychic energy at one Humanoid it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny neogi hatchling. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

SwarmofBites.name: SwarmofBites
SwarmofBites.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (6d6 + 1) poison damage, or 11 (3d6 + 1) poison damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The neogi makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the neogi's darkvision.

MentalFortitude.name: Mental Fortitude
MentalFortitude.description: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The neogi makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, or it makes two Eldritch Bolt attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Pseudopod.description: mw 6 to hit (with advantage if the plasmoid has one or more allies within 10 feet of itself), reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous

AberrantMind.description: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The psurlon has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the frightened, stunned, or unconscious condition on itself. While one of the psurlon's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The psurlon makes two Bite attacks and two Claw attacks. It can also use Pacify (if available) or Psychic Crush.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw

The condition ends if the target takes any damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the target awake.

PsychicCrush.name: PsychicCrush
PsychicCrush.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 (3d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Glory.name: Glory
Glory.description: The reigar's Armor Class includes its Charisma modifier.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The reigar can hold its breath for 1 hour.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: The reigar wears a talarith|BAM.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The reigar makes two Trident attacks.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) force damage if the reigar is wearing its talarith.

ChromaticBolt.name: ChromaticBolt
ChromaticBolt.description: rs 10 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (5d8) damage of a type chosen by the reigar from the following list: cold, fire, lightning, or radiant.

SummonDuplicate(RechargesafteraShortorLo.name: SummonDuplicate(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Summon Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SummonDuplicate(RechargesafteraShortorLo.description: Using its talarith, the reigar summons a duplicate of itself. The duplicate obeys the reigar's commands and uses the reigar's statistics, except it is an unaligned Construct that doesn't have a talarith of its own. The duplicate takes its turn immediately after the reigar. It vanishes after 1 hour or when it is reduced to 0 hit points.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}.name: PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}
PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a flashing mote of radiant energy that travels to a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of itself, then blossoms into a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DyingBurst.name: Dying Burst
DyingBurst.description: When the clown drops to 0 hit points, it pops like a balloon, releasing a splash of putrid, corrosive ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the clown when it bursts must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Squeakers.name: Squeakers
Squeakers.description: The clown wears shoes that squeak when it walks. The squeaking can be heard out to a range of 30 feet. The squeaking is silenced while the clown's Phantasmal Form is in effect.

Shock.name: Shock
Shock.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) lightning damage.

RayGun.name: RayGun
RayGun.description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and if the target is a Humanoid with an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, it must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target perceives everything it sees or hears as hilariously funny and is incapacitated for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The eel doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: If it isn't attached to a creature, the eel makes one Bite attack and one Tail Spine attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the eel attaches to the target. While attached, the eel can't make Bite attacks. Instead, the target takes 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage at the start of each of the eel's turns. The eel can detach itself as a bonus action. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the eel.

TailSpine.name: TailSpine
TailSpine.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

AirEnvelope.name: Air Envelope
AirEnvelope.description: If it has at least 1 hit point, the guppy can generate an air envelope around itself when in a vacuum. This air envelope can sustain the guppy and one other Tiny creature in its space indefinitely.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The guppy doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

TailSlap.name: TailSlap
TailSlap.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

GofortheEyes{@recharge}.name: GofortheEyes{@recharge}
GofortheEyes{@recharge}.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the start of the hamster's next turn.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The mollymawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The mollymawk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

IntellectFortress.name: Intellect Fortress
IntellectFortress.description: The ssurran's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks and uses Defile (if available).

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

Defile{@recharge}.name: Defile{@recharge}
Defile{@recharge}.description: Ordinary vegetation within 10 feet of the ssurran withers and dies. In addition, each creature within 10 feet of the ssurran must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The ssurran regains 5 (1d10) hit points for each creature that fails the saving throw.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

PoisonBomb.name: PoisonBomb
PoisonBomb.description: The ssurran throws a tangerine-sized bomb at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes, releasing a 10-foot-radius sphere of poisonous gas that disperses quickly. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the ssurran throws a bomb, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the ssurran has no more bombs to throw.

AstralExistence.name: Astral Existence
AstralExistence.description: The apparition can exist only on the Astral Plane. If it is sent to a location not on the Astral Plane, the apparition is destroyed.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: While it has at least 1 hit point, the apparition sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The apparition can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The apparition doesn't require air, drink, food, or sleep.

RadiantEruption.name: RadiantEruption
RadiantEruption.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) radiant damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One Humanoid that the apparition can see within 5 feet of itself must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the apparition; the apparition then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The apparition now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The apparition can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks and one Chatkcha attack.

Gythka.name: Gythka
