Gythka.description: mw 7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Chatkcha.name: Chatkcha
Chatkcha.description: rw 7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka or Chatkcha attacks.

Gythka.name: Gythka
Gythka.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

Chatkcha.name: Chatkcha
Chatkcha.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks or four Psychic Bolt attacks.

Gythka.name: Gythka
Gythka.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage.

PsychicBolt.name: PsychicBolt
PsychicBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) psychic damage.

DrainVitality(RechargesafteraShortorLong.name: DrainVitality(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Drain Vitality (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

DrainVitality(RechargesafteraShortorLong.description: The thri-kreen targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The thri-kreen regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: When the vampirate is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The vampirate can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The vampirate doesn't require air or drink.

EnergyDrain.name: EnergyDrain
EnergyDrain.description: ms,rs 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow under the DM's control.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: When the captain is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The captain can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The captain doesn't require air or drink.

EnergyDrain.name: EnergyDrain
EnergyDrain.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow or vampirate (captain's choice) under the DM's control.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

ShipInvisibility(RechargesafteraShortorL.name: ShipInvisibility(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Ship Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

ShipInvisibility(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: A ship upon which the captain stands, along with all creatures and objects aboard it, becomes invisible to creatures not aboard the ship. The captain must concentrate on this magical effect to maintain it (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell), and it lasts for up to 1 hour. The effect ends if the captain leaves the ship.

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: When the mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The mage can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The mage doesn't require air or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mage makes two Ray of Cold attacks.

EnergyDrain.name: EnergyDrain
EnergyDrain.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow under the DM's control.

RayofCold.name: RayofCold
RayofCold.description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) cold damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The scavver doesn't require air.

SwallowingBite.name: SwallowingBite
SwallowingBite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 45 (6d12 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the scavver. The scavver can have one creature swallowed at a time.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

ColdBreath{@recharge5}.name: ColdBreath{@recharge5}
ColdBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a blast of frost in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 (6d8) cold damage, and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) radiant damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}.name: PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}
PhotonicBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a flashing mote of radiant energy that travels to a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of itself, then blossoms into a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DisembodiedVoice.name: Disembodied Voice
DisembodiedVoice.description: Up to three times in its life, the zodar can cause a message of up to twenty-five words to issue from the air around it. It speaks only when it has something profoundly important to say, and the message can be understood by any creature that has an Intelligence score of 2 or higher.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the zodar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

TransportInhibitor.name: Transport Inhibitor
TransportInhibitor.description: The zodar can't be teleported or sent to any plane of existence against its will.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The zodar doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zodar makes two Crushing Fist attacks. Before or after these attacks, the zodar uses Forced Teleport.

CrushingFist.name: CrushingFist
CrushingFist.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.

ForcedTeleport.name: ForcedTeleport
ForcedTeleport.description: The zodar magically warps space around one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) force damage, and the zodar teleports it, along with any equipment it's wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that the zodar can see and that can support the target. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't teleported.

BadFlier.name: Bad Flier
BadFlier.description: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

SuaveDefense.name: Suave Defense
SuaveDefense.description: While Amrik is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Amrik makes three dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

SmokeBomb(1/Day).name: SmokeBomb(1/Day)
SmokeBomb(1/Day).description: Amrik hurls a smoke bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact, creating a cloud of black smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. The area within the cloud is heavily obscured. A strong wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise remains until the end of Amrik's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The aerosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aerosaur makes one Bite attack and one Talons attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the aerosaur can't Bite another target.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage.

WingGusts{@recharge5}.name: WingGusts{@recharge5}
WingGusts{@recharge5}.description: The aerosaur beats its wings, creating bursts of thunderous force. Each creature within 10 feet of the aerosaur must make a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) thunder damage, is pushed up to 30 feet horizontally from the aerosaur, and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed up to 15 feet horizontally from the aerosaur.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The altisaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The altisaur makes one Stomp attack and one Tail attack. The altisaur can't make both attacks against the same target.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (7d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 45 (8d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet horizontally from the altisaur.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The bag jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bag jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the barrowghast must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Stench of all barrowghasts for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The barrowghast makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one Slam attack with a Life Drain attack.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cairnwight makes two Slam attacks or two Rock attacks, and it uses its Petrifying Touch if available.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

PetrifyingTouch{@recharge5}.name: PetrifyingTouch{@recharge5}
PetrifyingTouch{@recharge5}.description: The cairnwight touches one creature it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 26 (4d12) force damage and have the restrained condition as it begins to turn to stone. The affected target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the target. On a failed save, the target has the petrified condition instead of the restrained condition.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ceratops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ceratops makes one Gore attack and one Stomp attack.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) piercing damage. If the ceratops moved at least 20 feet in a straight line toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 11 (2d10) piercing damage; if the target is a creature, it also must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet from the ceratops and have the prone condition.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the cinder hulk dies, it leaves behind a cloud of cinders and smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Any creature that moves into the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) fire damage. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until it is dispersed by strong wind.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cinder hulk makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

WaveofCinders{@recharge5}.name: WaveofCinders{@recharge5}
WaveofCinders{@recharge5}.description: The cinder hulk emits a wave of smoldering ash from its face, hands, or chest in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 31 (7d8) fire damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

CloudRune.name: Cloud Rune
CloudRune.description: The giant has a cloud rune inscribed on a mask in its possession. While holding or wearing the mask bearing the rune, the giant has truesight within a range of 30 feet and can use its Thunderous Clap action and Negate Spell reaction.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three Flying Staff attacks.

FlyingStaff.name: FlyingStaff
FlyingStaff.description: mw,rw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d10) thunder damage. {@hom}The staff magically returns to the giant's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

ThunderousClap(RequiresCloudRune).name: ThunderousClap(RequiresCloudRune)
ThunderousClap(RequiresCloudRune).description: The giant magically summons a thundercloud that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the giant can see within 60 feet of itself. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw as the cloud emits a thunderous boom. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) thunder damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. The thunderclap is audible within 300 feet of the cloud's center point.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The giant doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two Scimitar attacks and one Storm Boomerang attack.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) slashing damage.

StormBoomerang.name: StormBoomerang
StormBoomerang.description: rw 12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d4 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn. {@hom}The boomerang magically returns to the giant's hand immediately after the attack.

AwakeningoftheScion.name: Awakening of the Scion
AwakeningoftheScion.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Memnor|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body dissipates into cloud wisps. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The cradle doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cradle makes three Slam or Wind Javelin attacks in any combination.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12) thunder damage.

WindJavelin.name: WindJavelin
WindJavelin.description: rw 17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Vortex{@recharge5}.name: Vortex{@recharge5}
Vortex{@recharge5}.description: The cradle conjures a vortex of wind at a point it can see within 90 feet of itself. The wind vortex is a 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature other than the cradle in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 71 (11d12) bludgeoning damage and has the restrained condition within the vortex. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space outside the cylinder. The vortex lasts until the start of the cradle's next turn. A creature with the restrained condition falls prone when the vortex ends.

AwakeningoftheScion.name: Awakening of the Scion
AwakeningoftheScion.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Surtur|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body hardens and crumbles to ash. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cradle makes three Slam or Hurl Lava attacks in any combination.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

HurlLava.name: HurlLava
HurlLava.description: rw 17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature within 5 feet of the fire takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 10 (3d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

EruptingBreath{@recharge5}.name: EruptingBreath{@recharge5}
EruptingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The cradle exhales flames and volcanic gases in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 55 (10d10) fire damage and has the poisoned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

AwakeningoftheScion.name: Awakening of the Scion
AwakeningoftheScion.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Thrym|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body shatters into shards of ice. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cradle makes two Slam or Hurl Icicle attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) cold damage.

HurlIcicle.name: HurlIcicle
HurlIcicle.description: rw 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

FreezingBreath{@recharge5}.name: FreezingBreath{@recharge5}
FreezingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The cradle exhales a blast of frost in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) cold damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. If this damage would reduce the target to 0 hit points, the target drops to 1 hit point instead and has the petrified condition, turning into a frozen statue.

AwakeningoftheScion.name: Awakening of the Scion
AwakeningoftheScion.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Grolantor|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body crumbles to dirt and moss. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cradle makes three Slam or Spit Rock attacks in any combination and one Grasping Root attack.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

SpitRock.name: SpitRock
SpitRock.description: rw 14 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

GraspingRoot.name: GraspingRoot
GraspingRoot.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature not grappled by the cradle. on hit: the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The root has AC 19 and can be severed by dealing 15 or more slashing damage to it on one attack. Cutting the root doesn't hurt the cradle but ends the grapple.

RollingHills{@recharge}.name: RollingHills{@recharge}
RollingHills{@recharge}.description: The cradle magically creates a wave of dirt that extends from a point on the ground within 120 feet of itself. The wave is up to 30 feet long, up to 30 feet tall, and up to 30 feet wide. Each creature in the wave must make a DC 22 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 58 (9d12) bludgeoning damage, has the prone condition, and is buried under dirt. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

AwakeningoftheScion.name: Awakening of the Scion
AwakeningoftheScion.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Skoraeus|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body crumbles to dust. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cradle makes two Slam or Spit Rock attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

SpitRock.name: SpitRock
SpitRock.description: rw 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

ShatteringRoar{@recharge5}.name: ShatteringRoar{@recharge5}
ShatteringRoar{@recharge5}.description: The cradle lets out a painfully load roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the cradle must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

AwakeningoftheScion.name: Awakening of the Scion
AwakeningoftheScion.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Stronmaus|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body bursts into light. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cradle makes three Slam or Spit Hailstone attacks in any combination.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12) lightning damage.

SpitHailstone.name: SpitHailstone
SpitHailstone.description: rw 18 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

LightningBarrage{@recharge5}.name: LightningBarrage{@recharge5}
LightningBarrage{@recharge5}.description: The cradle hurls multiple magical lightning bolts at up to two creatures it can see within 500 feet of itself. Each target must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 71 (11d12) lightning damage and has the stunned condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two Scythe or Soul Bolt attacks.

Scythe.name: Scythe
Scythe.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

SoulBolt.name: SoulBolt
SoulBolt.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target has the frightened condition, the giant gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

DeathRune.name: Death Rune
DeathRune.description: The giant has a death rune inscribed on a giant's skull in its possession. While holding or wearing the skull bearing the rune, the giant can use its Reaping Scythe action and Shroud of Souls bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three Soul Burst attacks. Alternatively, if the giant has its death rune, it can make three Reaping Scythe attacks.

SoulBurst.name: SoulBurst
SoulBurst.description: ms,rs 11 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) necrotic damage. If the target has the frightened condition, the giant gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

ReapingScythe(RequiresDeathRune).name: ReapingScythe(RequiresDeathRune)
ReapingScythe(RequiresDeathRune).description: ms 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. on hit: 38 (7d10) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn. The target dies if it is reduced to 0 hit points by this attack.

AirForm.name: Air Form
AirForm.description: The dust hulk can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the dust hulk dies, it explodes in a burst of dust that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have the blinded condition for 1 minute. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dust hulk makes three Slam attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Stinging Dust.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

StingingDust.name: StingingDust
StingingDust.description: One creature of the dust hulk's choice inside its space must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The echo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: When one of the echo's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The echo makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ceremorph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ceremorph makes one Slam attack and one Tentacles attack. The ceremorph can replace one of the attacks with a Mind Bolt attack, if available.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until this grapple ends.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid grappled by the ceremorph. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindBolt(3/Day).name: MindBolt(3/Day)
MindBolt(3/Day).description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

DeathCurse.name: Death Curse
DeathCurse.description: When the fensir starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate, it releases a curse on those around it. Each creature within 30 feet of the fensir when it dies must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be cursed for the next 24 hours.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The fensir regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the fensir takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the fensir's next turn. The fensir dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: When the fensir starts its turn in sunlight, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the petrified condition until the fensir is no longer in sunlight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fensir makes two attacks, using Rend, Boulder, or a combination of them.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: rw 8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the fensir throws the boulder, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the fensir has no more boulders to throw.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The fensir regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the fensir takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the fensir's next turn. The fensir dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SunlightHypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
SunlightHypersensitivity.description: When the fensir starts its turn in sunlight, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the petrified condition until the fensir is no longer in sunlight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fensir makes three Battleaxe attacks or two Magic Stone attacks.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

MagicStone.name: MagicStone
MagicStone.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d12 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

MudtoStone{@recharge}.name: MudtoStone{@recharge}
MudtoStone{@recharge}.description: The fensir lobs a magical mass of mud that splashes all creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the fensir can see within 60 feet of itself. Each non-fensir creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage and have the restrained condition as the mud begins to turn to stone. An affected creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the creature. On a failed save, the creature has the petrified condition for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The firbolg makes two Spear or Fire Lance attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

FireLance.name: FireLance
FireLance.description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) fire damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The firbolg makes two attacks using Longsword, Bewitching Bolt, or a combination of them.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

BewitchingBolt.name: BewitchingBolt
BewitchingBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or have the charmed condition until the start of the target's next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

FireRune.name: Fire Rune
FireRune.description: The giant has a fire rune inscribed on a medallion or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Magma Wave action and Furnace Armor bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three Forge Hammer attacks or two Heated Rock attacks.

ForgeHammer.name: ForgeHammer
ForgeHammer.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (5d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. {@hom}The giant can cause the hammer to emit a burst of heat in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Metal objects in that area glow red-hot until the start of the giant's next turn. Any creature in physical contact with a heated object at the start of its turn must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) fire damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn unless it has immunity to fire damage. The hammer can emit heat in this way only once per turn.

HeatedRock.name: HeatedRock
HeatedRock.description: rw 13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the giant throws the rock, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the giant has no more rocks to throw.

MagmaWave(RequiresFireRune).name: MagmaWave(RequiresFireRune)
MagmaWave(RequiresFireRune).description: The giant emits a wave of magma from its fire rune in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) fire damage and has the restrained condition. As an action, a creature can make a DC 19 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself or a creature within its reach from the rock on a success. The rock restraining each creature has AC 17; 20 hit points; and immunity to fire, poison, and psychic damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

ShrapnelExplosion.name: Shrapnel Explosion
ShrapnelExplosion.description: When the giant drops to 0 hit points, its armor explodes, destroying the giant's body and scattering the armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the giant when its armor explodes must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two Searing Scepter attacks or two Bolt of Imix attacks.

SearingScepter.name: SearingScepter
SearingScepter.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage, and the target is magically branded. While branded in this way, the target becomes visible if it's invisible, can't become invisible, and sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. The brand disappears after 24 hours, or it can be removed from a creature or an object by any spell that ends a curse.

BoltofImix.name: BoltofImix
BoltofImix.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until the end of the target's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hellion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SoulTaker.name: Soul Taker
SoulTaker.description: A Giant or a Humanoid that is reduced to 0 hit points by the hellion dies, and its soul rises as a lemure (see the Monster Manual) on Avernus, one of the Nine Hells, in 1d4 hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, it can be restored to life only by a wish spell or by killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hellion makes two Morningstar attacks.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the hellion's next turn.

InfernalOrb.name: InfernalOrb
InfernalOrb.description: The hellion hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the hellion can see within 120 feet of itself. The sphere spreads around corners. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 18 (4d8) fire damage and 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FireBlood.name: Fire Blood
FireBlood.description: Whenever a creature within 5 feet of the firegaunt hits the firegaunt with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The firegaunt makes two Heated Maul attacks.

HeatedMaul.name: HeatedMaul
HeatedMaul.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. The firegaunt can cause the maul to erupt with crimson flames, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) fire damage and 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The maul can erupt with flames in this way only once per turn.

CrimsonRays{@recharge5}.name: CrimsonRays{@recharge5}
CrimsonRays{@recharge5}.description: The firegaunt emits beams of fire from its eyes, mouth, and wounds in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, that creature catches fire. Until the burning creature or another creature that can reach it takes an action to extinguish the fire, the burning creature can't regain hit points and takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: If the core inside the colossus is destroyed, the colossus goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the colossus attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the colossus attacks an object. Once the colossus goes berserk, it remains berserk until it is destroyed.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The colossus makes two Fist attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 13 to hit (with advantage if the colossus is berserk), reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is pulled up to 15 feet toward the colossus, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 17), and it has the restrained condition until this grapple ends. The colossus can have up to two creatures grappled this way at a time.

ElementalBreath{@recharge5}.name: ElementalBreath{@recharge5}
ElementalBreath{@recharge5}.description: The colossus exhales a cloud swirling with elemental energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 (9d8) damage of a type of the colossus's choosing: acid, cold, fire, or lightning. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

Contortionist.name: Contortionist
Contortionist.description: The fomorian can enter a space large enough for a Large creature without squeezing.

CrawlingStance.name: Crawling Stance
CrawlingStance.description: While the fomorian has the prone condition, crawling does not cost it extra movement. In addition, the prone condition does not grant advantage on attack rolls against the fomorian.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The fomorian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fomorian makes two Slam attacks and uses Crawling Hex if it is available.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

CrawlingHex{@recharge4}.name: CrawlingHex{@recharge4}
CrawlingHex{@recharge4}.description: The fomorian targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 31 (7d8) psychic damage, have the prone condition, and become cursed for 1 hour. While cursed this way, the target can't stand up and end the prone condition on itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fomorian makes three Rod attacks.

Rod.name: Rod
Rod.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

BloodRune.name: Blood Rune
BloodRune.description: The fomorian has a blood rune inscribed on an effigy or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Corrupting Hex action and Poisoning Rebuke reaction.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fomorian's darkvision.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the fomorian fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fomorian makes three Greatclub attacks. If the fomorian has its blood rune, it can replace one of these attacks with a use of Corrupting Hex.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

CorruptingHex(RequiresBloodRune).name: CorruptingHex(RequiresBloodRune)
CorruptingHex(RequiresBloodRune).description: The fomorian targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage and become cursed for 24 hours. While cursed this way, the target's speed is reduced by half, and if it tries to cast a spell, it must first succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence check or the spell fails and is wasted.

EldritchBurst.name: EldritchBurst
EldritchBurst.description: Magical energy explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the fomorian can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 32 (5d12) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

FrostRune.name: Frost Rune
FrostRune.description: The giant has a frost rune inscribed on a chunk of ice or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Ice Wolves action and Ice Armor reaction.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three attacks using Greataxe, Freezing Ray, or a combination of them.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

FreezingRay.name: FreezingRay
FreezingRay.description: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) cold damage, and the target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the restrained condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

IceWolves(RequiresFrostRune).name: IceWolves(RequiresFrostRune)
IceWolves(RequiresFrostRune).description: The giant magically summons 1d4 wolves made of ice (use the winter wolf stat block in the Monster Manual to represent them, but they are Elementals instead of Monstrosities). The wolves appear in unoccupied spaces the giant can see within 30 feet of itself. The wolves take their turn immediately after the giant on the same initiative count, and they obey the giant's commands. The wolves gain a +6 bonus to their attack and damage rolls while they are within 30 feet of the giant. The wolves disappear after 1 minute, when the giant dies, or when the giant uses this action again.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The giant can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two Battleaxe attacks and one Harpoon attack.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: rw 7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 16). While the target is grappled this way, its speed isn't reduced, but it can't move farther from the giant. The target takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The giant can grapple only one target at a time with its harpoon.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The frostmourn makes one Freezing Touch attack and one Icy Axe attack. It can replace one of these attacks with a Polar Ray attack.

FreezingTouch.name: FreezingTouch
FreezingTouch.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d8) cold damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage. If this damage would reduce the target to 0 hit points, the target drops to 1 hit point instead and has the petrified condition, turning into a frozen statue.

IcyAxe.name: IcyAxe
IcyAxe.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

PolarRay.name: PolarRay
PolarRay.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (5d10 + 4) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

ChillingAura.name: Chilling Aura
ChillingAura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the fury must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) cold damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The fury has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fury makes two Fist or Rock attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage, or 17 (5d6) cold damage if the target took damage from the fury's Chilling Aura since the end of the fury's last turn.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

WeirdAura.name: Weird Aura
WeirdAura.description: At the start of each of the gargantua's turns, each creature of the gargantua's choice within 30 feet of it must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target sees the gargantua as a manifestation of the target's worst fears; it takes 17 (5d6) psychic damage and has the frightened condition until the start of the target's next turn. On a successful save, a target is immune to this gargantua's Weird Aura for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gargantua makes two Slam or Rock attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 15 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The goose makes one Beak attack and two Wing attacks.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Wing.name: Wing
Wing.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

ThunderousHonk{@recharge5}.name: ThunderousHonk{@recharge5}
ThunderousHonk{@recharge5}.description: The goose honks with ear-splitting volume. Each other creature within 30 feet of the goose must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 (3d10) thunder damage and has the deafened condition until the start of the goose's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. The honk can be heard within 300 feet.

Lynx'sSight(1/Day).name: Lynx's Sight
Lynx'sSight(1/Day).description: The lynx can cast clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

WoodlandCamouflage.name: Woodland Camouflage
WoodlandCamouflage.description: The lynx has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in undergrowth or snowy terrain.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the lynx moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lynx can make another Claws attack against it as a bonus action.

BeastofBurden.name: Beast of Burden
BeastofBurden.description: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage, and it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage. If the ram moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

ForceBolt.name: ForceBolt
ForceBolt.description: rs 4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d6) force damage.

Proboscis.name: Proboscis
Proboscis.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the tick attaches to the target. While attached, the tick can't make Proboscis attacks. The tick can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. As an action, a creature within reach of the tick can try to detach the tick, doing so with a successful DC 13 Strength check.

BloodDrain.name: BloodDrain
BloodDrain.description: The tick deals 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage to one creature it is physically attached to, provided that creature isn't a Construct or an Undead, or 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage if the creature is a Giant. The tick regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Spell-ResistantCarapace.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
Spell-ResistantCarapace.description: The gigant has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against the gigant has disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gigant makes one Mandibles attack and two Talons attacks.

Mandibles.name: Mandibles
Mandibles.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage at the start of each of the gigant's turns. While the gigant is grappling a target, it can't use Mandibles against other targets.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target is pulled 10 feet straight toward the gigant.

ScaleDust{@recharge5}.name: ScaleDust{@recharge5}
ScaleDust{@recharge5}.description: The gigant releases magical dust from its wings in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 hour. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The goliath makes two Spear attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The grinning cat has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage. If the grinning cat was invisible before it attacked, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the cat can make a Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

FadeAway.name: FadeAway
FadeAway.description: The grinning cat magically becomes invisible for 1 hour or until it attacks, gradually fading away over the course of its turn. It can choose to leave part of its body visible, such as its tail, its head, or its grinning mouth. Any equipment the cat wears or carries is invisible with it.

HillRune.name: Hill Rune
HillRune.description: The giant has a hill rune inscribed on a rock or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Stone Avalanche action and Hill Rebuff reaction.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes one Greatclub attack and uses Stone Bolas.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage.

StoneBolas.name: StoneBolas
StoneBolas.description: The giant conjures three stone balls connected by lines of magical force and throws them at one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the restrained condition until the start of the giant's next turn, and the stones erupt in a burst of thunderous energy that deals 14 (4d6) thunder damage to the target and each creature within 10 feet of the target. On a successful save, the stones vanish without erupting.

StoneAvalanche(RequiresHillRune).name: StoneAvalanche(RequiresHillRune)
StoneAvalanche(RequiresHillRune).description: The giant conjures a hail of rocks in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point on the ground it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The lightning hulk sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

LightningForm.name: Lightning Form
LightningForm.description: The lightning hulk can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time the lightning hulk enters a creature's space on a turn, or if it begins its turn in a creature's space, that creature takes 7 (2d6) lightning damage. The hulk can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing. A creature that touches the lightning hulk or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

ArcLightning.name: ArcLightning
ArcLightning.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d8) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn, and lightning jumps from the target to another creature of the lightning hulk's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. The second creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) lightning damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The maw has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The maw makes two Bite or Fang Fling attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.

FangFling.name: FangFling
FangFling.description: rw 10 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage.

GorgingCharge{@recharge5}.name: GorgingCharge{@recharge5}
GorgingCharge{@recharge5}.description: The maw moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures. Each time the maw enters a creature's space for the first time during this move, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or take 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage and have the grappled condition (escape 16); if a creature is already grappled this way, it has the prone condition. Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition. The maw can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

AirForm.name: Air Form
AirForm.description: The mist hulk can enter another creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the mist hulk dies, it bursts in a wave of water. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mist hulk makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) cold damage.

HideousWailing{@recharge5}.name: HideousWailing{@recharge5}
HideousWailing{@recharge5}.description: The mist hulk releases a wail infused with magical anguish. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. A creature in the mist hulk's space has disadvantage on the saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage and has the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The mud hulk can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

StickyMud.name: Sticky Mud
StickyMud.description: The ground within 15 feet of the mud hulk is difficult terrain for other creatures.

EnvelopingSlam.name: EnvelopingSlam
EnvelopingSlam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled into the mud hulk's space and be engulfed by the mud hulk. While engulfed, the target can't breathe, has the restrained condition, and takes 6 (1d12) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. When the mud hulk moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mud hulk can have only one target engulfed at a time. While a creature is engulfed, the mud hulk can't use its Amorphous trait.

MudSplash.name: MudSplash
MudSplash.description: The mud hulk lobs a mass of mud that splashes in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 30 feet of the mud hulk. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The affected area is difficult terrain until the start of the mud hulk's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The regisaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The regisaur makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack. The regisaur can't target the same creature with both attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 47 (6d12 + 8) piercing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the regisaur can't Bite another target.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the rime hulk dies, it explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere of frigid air and frost centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) cold damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The rime hulk makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

TrailofFrost{@recharge5}.name: TrailofFrost{@recharge5}
TrailofFrost{@recharge5}.description: The rime hulk moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can move through the space of any Medium or smaller creature. Each time the rime hulk enters another creature's space for the first time during this move, that creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the rime hulk's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The colossus makes two Slam attacks and then uses Stomp.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or have the prone condition. Until the colossus uses its Stomp again or moves, the creature has the restrained condition. The restrained creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can use its action to make a DC 22 Strength check. On a successful check, the affected creature relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the colossus and is no longer restrained.

ArcaneBeam{@recharge5}.name: ArcaneBeam{@recharge5}
ArcaneBeam{@recharge5}.description: The colossus fires a beam of magical force from its chest, hands, or head in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 58 (9d12) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes one Great Tree Club attack and two Slam attacks, or it makes three Boulder attacks.

GreatTreeClub.name: GreatTreeClub
GreatTreeClub.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be pushed horizontally up to 100 feet straight away from the scion and have the prone condition.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) force damage.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: rw 15 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Inhale{@recharge5}.name: Inhale{@recharge5}
Inhale{@recharge5}.description: The scion inhales a vortex of air in a 120-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that area that is Huge or smaller must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 120 feet straight toward the scion and be swallowed. A swallowed creature has the restrained condition, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the scion, and takes 24 (7d6) force damage at the start of each of the scion's turns.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The scion doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes one attack using Cloud Morningstar or Wind Javelin, as well as two Slam attacks.

CloudMorningstar.name: CloudMorningstar
CloudMorningstar.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) force damage plus 22 (4d10) thunder damage.

WindJavelin.name: WindJavelin
WindJavelin.description: rw 18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 42 (5d12 + 10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) force damage.

ThunderousVortex{@recharge5}.name: ThunderousVortex{@recharge5}
ThunderousVortex{@recharge5}.description: The scion magically creates a vortex of wind in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled straight toward the sphere's center, ending in an unoccupied space as close as possible to the center. Then a burst of thunder erupts in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the same point. Each creature in that area takes 52 (8d12) thunder damage and must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes one Crystal Club attack and two Slam attacks, then uses Entombing Grasp if available. Alternatively, the scion makes two Runic Boulder attacks.

CrystalClub.name: CrystalClub
CrystalClub.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage. {@hom}The scion can cause the club to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or take 18 (4d8) radiant damage and have the blinded condition until the start of the scion's next turn.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) force damage.

RunicBoulder.name: RunicBoulder
RunicBoulder.description: rw 16 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage. {@hom}The boulder explodes. The target and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

EntombingGrasp{@recharge}.name: EntombingGrasp{@recharge}
EntombingGrasp{@recharge}.description: The scion wreathes its hand in petrifying magic and touches one Huge or smaller creature it can see within 20 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 28 (8d6) force damage and have the grappled condition (escape 19). At the start of the scion's next turn, if the target is still grappled, the target has the petrified condition.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The scion doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes one attack using Lightning Sword or Hailstone, as well as two Slam attacks.

LightningSword.name: LightningSword
LightningSword.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage plus 22 (4d10) lightning damage.

Hailstone.name: Hailstone
Hailstone.description: rw 18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage.

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes one attack using Lava Blade or Lava Ball, as well as two Slam attacks.

LavaBlade.name: LavaBlade
LavaBlade.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) fire damage.

LavaBall.name: LavaBall
LavaBall.description: rw 18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) force damage.

LavaWave{@recharge5}.name: LavaWave{@recharge5}
