LavaWave{@recharge5}.description: The scion emits a wave of lava from its blade, hands, or mouth in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 60 (11d10) fire damage and has the restrained condition from being embedded in hardening rock. A creature can make a DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 40 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes one Ice Axe and two Slam attacks, or it makes two Glacier Throw attacks.

IceAxe.name: IceAxe
IceAxe.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) force damage.

GlacierThrow.name: GlacierThrow
GlacierThrow.description: rw 17 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

GlacialUpheaval{@recharge5}.name: GlacialUpheaval{@recharge5}
GlacialUpheaval{@recharge5}.description: The scion digs its hands into the ground at a point it can see within 30 feet of itself and launches a magically conjured mass of ice into the air. Each creature other than the scion in a 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12) cold damage and is pushed vertically to the top of the cylinder, at which point the creature falls. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space outside the cylinder with no additional effects.

BlurredForm.name: Blurred Form
BlurredForm.description: Attack rolls against the spectral cloud are made with disadvantage unless the attacker is within 15 feet of the spectral cloud or the spectral cloud is incapacitated.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The spectral cloud can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spectral cloud makes two Spectral Touch attacks.

SpectralTouch.name: SpectralTouch
SpectralTouch.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) force damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

ChillingWinds{@recharge5}.name: ChillingWinds{@recharge5}
ChillingWinds{@recharge5}.description: The spectral cloud emits intensely cold wind in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) cold damage and has the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the lion moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lion can make another Rend attack against it as a bonus action.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: The stalker can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The stalker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The stalker makes two Glaive attacks or two Rock attacks.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the stalker throws the rock, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the stalker has no more rocks to throw.

EruptingHorns{@recharge5}.name: EruptingHorns{@recharge5}
EruptingHorns{@recharge5}.description: The stalker causes the earth to churn at a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of itself. Six horn-shaped stones erupt in a 30-foot-radius, 30-foot-high cylinder centered on that point and then crumble to dust.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two Thundering Stone Club or Boulder attacks in any combination.

ThunderingStoneClub.name: ThunderingStoneClub
ThunderingStoneClub.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. The giant can cause the club to emit a burst of thunderous energy that deals 10 (3d6) thunder damage to each creature, other than the giant, within 30 feet of the target. The club can emit a burst this way only once per turn.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: rw 10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the giant throws the boulder, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the giant has no more boulders to throw.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

StoneRune.name: Stone Rune
StoneRune.description: The giant has a stone rune inscribed on a mineral object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Prismatic Rays action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three Prism Staff attacks.

PrismStaff.name: PrismStaff
PrismStaff.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

ExplodingGeode.name: ExplodingGeode
ExplodingGeode.description: The giant throws a geode at a point within 60 feet of itself, and the geode explodes in a dazzling flash. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 (3d8) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. After the giant throws the geode, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giant has no more geodes to throw.

PrismaticRays(RequiresStoneRune).name: PrismaticRays(RequiresStoneRune)
PrismaticRays(RequiresStoneRune).description: The giant's stone rune emits beams of light that form a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. For each creature in that area, roll a d6 to determine what ray affects it:

1-2:BlazingRed.name: 1-2:BlazingRed
1-2:BlazingRed.description: On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

3-4:DreadfulBlue.name: 3-4:DreadfulBlue
3-4:DreadfulBlue.description: On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) necrotic damage and has the frightened condition until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

5-6:SappingGreen.name: 5-6:SappingGreen
5-6:SappingGreen.description: On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) force damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The crab can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The crab makes two Claw attacks and one Stinger attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 16). The crab has four claws, each of which can grapple one target.

Stinger.name: Stinger
Stinger.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned and paralyzed conditions for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending both the poisoned and paralyzed conditions on itself on a success.

WaterJet{@recharge5}.name: WaterJet{@recharge5}
WaterJet{@recharge5}.description: The crab exhales water in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage, is pushed up to 30 feet from the crab, and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

Alert.name: Alert
Alert.description: The giant can't be surprised, and it has advantage on initiative rolls.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The giant can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Scrying(RequiresStormRune).name: Scrying (Requires Storm Rune)
Scrying(RequiresStormRune).description: The giant can use its crystal ball to cast the scrying spell (save DC 17).

StormRune.name: Storm Rune
StormRune.description: The giant has a storm rune inscribed on a crystal ball. While the object bearing the rune is embedded in its body, the giant can use its Tempest Call action and its Scrying trait.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three Lightning Blade or Lightning Lance attacks.

LightningBlade.name: LightningBlade
LightningBlade.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) lightning damage.

LightningLance.name: LightningLance
LightningLance.description: rs 13 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. on hit: 39 (5d12 + 7) lightning damage.

TempestCall(RequiresStormRune).name: TempestCall(RequiresStormRune)
TempestCall(RequiresStormRune).description: The giant creates an elemental vortex that fills a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area other than the giant must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 43 (8d8 + 7) damage of a type of the giant's choosing: cold, lightning, or thunder. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The herald can breathe air and water.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The herald has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The herald makes one Claw attack, one Tentacles attack, and one Trident attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) slashing damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). It also has the restrained condition and takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until this grapple ends. The herald can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) piercing damage or 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage.

PsychicWave{@recharge}.name: PsychicWave{@recharge}
PsychicWave{@recharge}.description: The herald unleashes a blast of psionic energy into the minds of up to three creatures it can see within 90 feet of itself. Each target must make a DC 21 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 23 (3d10 + 7) psychic damage and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The spirit takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the spirit fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spirit makes two Lightning Fist or Hailstone attacks in any combination.

LightningFist.name: LightningFist
LightningFist.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) lightning damage.

Hailstone.name: Hailstone
Hailstone.description: rw 12 to hit, range 90/180 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

DeathBolt{@recharge5}.name: DeathBolt{@recharge5}
DeathBolt{@recharge5}.description: The spirit hurls a magical lightning bolt in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, an affected creature's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The creature dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

BeastofBurden.name: Beast of Burden
BeastofBurden.description: The titanothere is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the titanothere moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition if it is a creature.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the amalgam fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The amalgam has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The amalgam regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If the amalgam takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The amalgam dies only if it takes 20 or more acid or fire damage while it has 0 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The amalgam makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage.

Mutation.name: Mutation
Mutation.description: When the troll mutate is created, it gains one of four possible body mutations at random: 1, Elastic Body; 2, Psionic Mirror; 3, Spell Scarred; or 4, Winged Form. This mutation determines certain traits in this stat block.

Amorphous(ElasticBodyOnly).name: Amorphous (Elastic Body Only)
Amorphous(ElasticBodyOnly).description: The mutate can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

MagicResistance(SpellScarredOnly).name: Magic Resistance (Spell Scarred Only)
MagicResistance(SpellScarredOnly).description: The mutate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PsychicRebuke(PsionicMirrorOnly).name: Psychic Rebuke (Psionic Mirror Only)
PsychicRebuke(PsionicMirrorOnly).description: If the mutate takes psychic damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The mutate regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the mutate takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the mutate's next turn. The mutate dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate. If the mutate starts its turn with 0 hit points and regenerates, it randomly gains a mutation it doesn't already have (up to a maximum of four mutations).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mutate makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. (or 15 ft. if the mutate has the Elastic Body mutation), one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

PsychicBurst{@recharge5}.name: PsychicBurst{@recharge5}
PsychicBurst{@recharge5}.description: The mutate unleashes a wave of psychic energy. Each creature within 30 feet of the mutate must make a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The broom doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

FalseObject.name: False Object
FalseObject.description: If the library is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the library move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the library is animate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The library makes two attacks.

ChainedBook.name: ChainedBook
ChainedBook.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Quill makes two attacks with his dagger and uses Supreme Mockery.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Quill'sFable{@recharge}.name: Quill'sFable{@recharge}
Quill'sFable{@recharge}.description: Quill utters a short fable while targeting up to five creatures within 30 feet of him that he can see. Each target that can hear Quill's magical fable must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SupremeMockery.name: SupremeMockery
SupremeMockery.description: Quill hurls a string of insults laced with enchantments at a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the creature can hear Quill (though it need not understand him), it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 66 (12d10) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Bak Mei fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Bak Mei carries a staff of striking with 10 charges.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While Bak Mei is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bak Mei attacks three times: twice with Thunder Strike and once with his staff of striking.

ThunderStrike.name: ThunderStrike
ThunderStrike.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) thunder damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be deafened and stunned until the start of Bak Mei's next turn.

StaffofStriking.name: StaffofStriking
StaffofStriking.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Bak Mei can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges. For each expended charge, the target takes an extra 1d6 force damage.

HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest)

value.value: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)

HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Bak Mei regains 2d8 + 4 hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on him.

LimitedSpellImmunity.name: Limited Spell Immunity
LimitedSpellImmunity.description: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) force damage.

CrystalDart.name: CrystalDart
CrystalDart.description: rw 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) force damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Abigor's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Abigor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Abigor makes four attacks using its Warhammer, Throwing Hammer, or a combination of the two.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

ThrowingHammer.name: ThrowingHammer
ThrowingHammer.description: rw 15 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage. Hammers thrown this way fall and stick into the ground after hitting their target and a new hammer appears in Abigor's hand.

ThunderousSlam{@recharge5}.name: ThunderousSlam{@recharge5}
ThunderousSlam{@recharge5}.description: Abigor causes all its hammers left on the battlefield to bristle with thunderous energy, exploding outwards with a roar. All creatures within a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on each hammer must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. Targets take 26 (4d12) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a creature is within multiple spheres, it must make the save multiple times, taking damage from each source.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Aeshma makes two attacks using his Shortsword, Hand Crossbow, or a combination of the two.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the kocrachon's darkvision.

InfernalRot.name: Infernal Rot
InfernalRot.description: A creature afflicted with this disease has the poisoned condition until the disease ends. While diseased, creatures gain no benefits from a long rest, gaining exhaustion when necessary. If a creature dies while afflicted with Infernal Rot, its corpse transforms into a newborn kocrachon after 4 (1d8) days.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The kocrachon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Sadism.name: Sadism
Sadism.description: The kocrachon gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for each different creature it damaged on its previous turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kocrachon makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Proboscis attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Proboscis.name: Proboscis
Proboscis.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage. Creatures damaged by this attack must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or suffer the Infernal Rot disease.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Anacreda makes two Claw attacks. She can replace one of the attacks with a Crushing Hug attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.

CrushingHug.name: CrushingHug
CrushingHug.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 51 (8d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, Anacreda grabs it with both arms. The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 73 (12d10 + 7) necrotic damage at the start of each of Anacreda's turns. Anacreda can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

Spinewall.name: Spinewall
Spinewall.description: Anacreda causes a 50-foot-long, 5-foot-wide row of bones to pierce the earth at a point within 120 feet of her. She chooses the direction of the line. The bones rise 10 feet into the air and form a solid wall. A 5-foot section of bone has an AC of 20 and 10 hit points.

ShatteringShriek(1/Day).name: ShatteringShriek(1/Day)
ShatteringShriek(1/Day).description: Anacreda shrieks loud enough to shatter stone and bone alike. Each creature within a 50-foot-radius sphere centered on Anacreda must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 55 (10d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unworked stone, exposed bone, and similar materials in the radius are shattered and turned into difficult terrain.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Anagwendol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Anagwendol makes two attacks using her Defending Greatsword, Longbow, or a combination of the two.

DefendingGreatsword.name: DefendingGreatsword
DefendingGreatsword.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

HealingTouch(2/Day).name: HealingTouch(2/Day)
HealingTouch(2/Day).description: Anagwendol touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

AbolethicVessel.name: Abolethic Vessel
AbolethicVessel.description: The spawn must obey its aboleth master.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The spawn can breathe air and water.

WaterDependency.name: Water Dependency
WaterDependency.description: The spawn takes 6 (1d12) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without being immersed in water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spawn makes one Spear attack, two Tentacle attacks, and one Psychic Lash attack.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 14) and takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The spawn has four tentacles, each of which can grapple one creature.

PsychicLash.name: PsychicLash
PsychicLash.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: Ebondeath can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: Ebondeath can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: Ebondeath enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

HorrifyingVisage.name: HorrifyingVisage
HorrifyingVisage.description: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of Ebondeath that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4  10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this Ebondeath's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One humanoid that Ebondeath can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by Ebondeath; Ebondeath then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. Ebondeath now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. Ebondeath can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, including gaining access to the target's knowledge, class features, and proficiencies.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The anchorite can use its action to polymorph into a boar or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

ClawedGauntlet(HumanoidFormOnly).name: ClawedGauntlet(HumanoidFormOnly)
ClawedGauntlet(HumanoidFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

Tusk(BoarFormOnly).name: Tusk(BoarFormOnly)
Tusk(BoarFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Don-Jon has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

NotDeadYet(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Not Dead Yet (Recharges after a Long Rest)
NotDeadYet(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: If damage reduces Don-Jon to 0 hit points, he drops to 1 hit point instead and gains advantage on attack rolls until the end of his next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Don-Jon makes three melee attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Archer.name: Archer
Archer.description: A longbow or shortbow deals one extra die of its damage when Falcon hits with it (included in his longbow attack).

Sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
Sharpshooter.description: Falcon's ranged weapon attacks ignore Cover||3||half cover and Cover||3||three-quarters cover.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Falcon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Relentless(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Relentless(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: If Gorthok takes 27 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Gorthok makes two melee attacks: one with its lightning tusks and one with its thunder hooves.

LightningTusks.name: LightningTusks
LightningTusks.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

ThunderHooves.name: ThunderHooves
ThunderHooves.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) thunder damage.

LightningBolt{@recharge}.name: LightningBolt{@recharge}
LightningBolt{@recharge}.description: Gorthok shoots a bolt of lightning at one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

MagicMissile(Expendsa1st-LevelSpellSlot).name: MagicMissile(Expendsa1st-LevelSpellSlot)
MagicMissile(Expendsa1st-LevelSpellSlot).description: The gnome creates three magical darts. Each dart hits a creature the gnome chooses within 120 feet of it and deals 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage.

RayofFrost.name: RayofFrost
RayofFrost.description: rs 4 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the gnome's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The pech has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the pech has disadvantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The pech makes two Fortified Pickaxe attacks. If it hits a Large or smaller creature with both attacks, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

FortifiedPickaxe.name: FortifiedPickaxe
FortifiedPickaxe.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Construct or an object, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

StoneShape(3/Day).name: StoneShape(3/Day)
StoneShape(3/Day).description: The pech casts Stone Shape, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

FeyRebirth.name: Fey Rebirth
FeyRebirth.description: If Yarnspinner dies in his Domain of Delight, he revives with all his hit points 1d4 days later in a safe location in that domain.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Yarnspinner fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Yarnspinner can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: Yarnspinner ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

WebWeaver(3/Day).name: Web Weaver
WebWeaver(3/Day).description: Yarnspinner can take 1 minute to craft one of the following structures out of webbing:

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Yarnspinner makes two Bite attacks and uses Spellcasting or Web once.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

Web.name: Web
Web.description: Yarnspinner shoots webbing at one creature he can see within 120 feet of himself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be restrained for 1 hour. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the fume drake dies, it explodes in a cloud of noxious fumes. Each creature within 5 feet of the fume drake must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 4 (1d8) poison damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The fume drake doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) fire damage.

ScaldingBreath{@recharge}.name: ScaldingBreath{@recharge}
ScaldingBreath{@recharge}.description: The fume drake exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

InquiringMind(1/Day).name: Inquiring Mind
InquiringMind(1/Day).description: The kobold can cast detect magic, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

AlchemicalFlame{@recharge}.name: AlchemicalFlame{@recharge}
AlchemicalFlame{@recharge}.description: The kobold unleashes fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The merrow can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The merrow makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The smuggler can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can't stop there.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: r 4, range 30/90 ft. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing damage.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The underboss can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can't stop there.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The underboss makes three attacks, using Poisoned|XPHB Blade or Arcane Firearm in any combination.

PoisonedBlade.name: PoisonedBlade
PoisonedBlade.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the underboss's next turn. If the target is already Poisoned|XPHB, it instead takes an extra 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

ArcaneFirearm.name: ArcaneFirearm
ArcaneFirearm.description: r 7, range 30/90 ft. on hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) Force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The artificer makes two attacks, using Battering Mace or Artillery Strike in any combination.

BatteringMace.name: BatteringMace
BatteringMace.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

ArtilleryStrike.name: ArtilleryStrike
ArtilleryStrike.description: r 6, range 120 ft. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) Force damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The bruiser has Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points|XPHB.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bruiser makes three Pummel attacks and uses Glare.

Pummel.name: Pummel
Pummel.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

Glare.name: Glare
Glare.description: wis DC 14, one creature the bruiser can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of the bruiser's next turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The raider has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raider's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Pummel.name: Pummel
Pummel.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The infiltrator makes three Mind Blade attacks.

MindBlade.name: MindBlade
MindBlade.description: m,r 7, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mindkiller makes two Nightmare Whisper attacks.

NightmareWhisper.name: NightmareWhisper
NightmareWhisper.description: m,r 9, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. on hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of the mindkiller's next turn. If the target is already Frightened|XPHB, it instead takes an extra 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

PrimalFear(1/Day).name: PrimalFear(1/Day)
PrimalFear(1/Day).description: wis DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on a point the mindkiller can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 35 (10d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of the mindkiller's next turn. While Frightened|XPHB in this way, the target can do only one of the following on each of its turns: move, take an action, or take a Bonus Action|XPHB. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

AuraofAuthority.name: Aura of Authority
AuraofAuthority.description: While in a 30-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the commander, the commander and its allies have Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the commander doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The commander makes two attacks, using Flail or Javelin in any combination.

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: m 6, reach 5 ft.  on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damageplus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage if the commander is Bloodiedand the target has Disadvantage|XPHB on its next attack roll before the start of the commander's next turn.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft.  on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damageplus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage if the commander is Bloodied|XPHB.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The knight makes two attacks, using Flail or Javelin in any combination.

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damageplus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage if the knight is Bloodiedand the target has Disadvantage|XPHB on its next attack roll before the start of the knight's next turn.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damageplus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage if the knight is Bloodied|XPHB.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The troubleshooter can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can't stop there.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troubleshooter makes two Poisoned Dagger attacks.

PoisonedDagger.name: PoisonedDagger
PoisonedDagger.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the troubleshooter's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The absorber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the absorber moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits its claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the absorber can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The absorber makes three attacks: one with its bite or Mind Bolt and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

MindBolt.name: MindBolt
MindBolt.description: rs 8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d10) psychic damage.

HorridGnashing.name: Horrid Gnashing
HorridGnashing.description: The nullifier's mouths gnash incoherently while it can see any enemies. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nullifier and can hear it must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature rolls a d8 to determine what it does during the current turn:

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The nullifier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nullifier makes three attacks: one with its bites and two with its claws.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it's a creature. The nullifier has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The reverser has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The reverser makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) force damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

AlienMind.name: Alien Mind
AlienMind.description: If a creature tries to read Belashyrra's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a DC 22 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

EyeThief.name: Eye Thief
EyeThief.description: Belashyrra can see through the eyes of all creatures within 120 feet of it. It can use its Eye Ray through any creature within 120 feet of it, as though it were in that creature's space.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Belashyrra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Belashyrra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Belashyrra regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Belashyrra dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: As a bonus action, Belashyrra can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Belashyrra makes two attacks with its claws and uses its Eye Ray once.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

EyeRay.name: EyeRay
EyeRay.description: Belashyrra shoots one of the following magical eye rays of its choice, targeting one creature it can see within 120 feet of it:

CommanderofBones.name: Commander of Bones
CommanderofBones.description: As a bonus action, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to twelve undead at a time this way.

MasterofthePallidBanner.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
MasterofthePallidBanner.description: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

ChangeAppearance.name: Change Appearance
ChangeAppearance.description: The changeling can use its action to polymorph into a Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The changeling makes two attacks with its dagger.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

UnsettlingVisage(RechargesafteraShortorL.name: UnsettlingVisage(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Unsettling Visage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

UnsettlingVisage(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: Each creature within 30 feet of the changeling must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The clawfoot has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the clawfoot's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the clawfoot moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the clawfoot can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The clawfoot makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape

After 1d10 days, he appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of his soul gem (so long as the gem still exists), using the Sammaster (Lich Form) stat block. The gem is a Tiny object that has AC 20; HP 50; and Immunity|XPHB to Acid, Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The gem regains all its Hit Points|XPHB at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sammaster makes three Rend attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Blight|XPHB or Ray of Sickness|XPHB (level 6 version).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 14, reach 10 ft. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Necrotic damage.

CorrodingBreath{@recharge5}.name: CorrodingBreath{@recharge5}
CorrodingBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 20, each creature in a 90-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 52 (8d12) Acid or Necrotic damage (Sammaster's choice). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Sammaster fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

LifeSuppression.name: Life Suppression
LifeSuppression.description: Creatures within 60 feet of Sammaster can't regain Hit Points|XPHB.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Sammaster has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SoulGem.name: Soul Gem
SoulGem.description: If Sammaster is reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB while his magical soul gem exists, his lich form dissolves to dust. After 1d10 days, he appears in the space of his soul gem, using the Sammaster (Dracolich Form) stat block. The gem is a Tiny object that has AC 20; HP 50; and Immunity|XPHB to Acid, Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The gem regains all its Hit Points|XPHB at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB. If the gem is destroyed, Sammaster can create a new one by completing an 8-hour ritual using a gem worth 1,000+ GP, which the ritual consumes, and by expending 5,000 GP.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sammaster makes three attacks, using Corrosive Burst or Paralyzing Touch in any combination. He can replace two attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

CorrosiveBurst.name: CorrosiveBurst
CorrosiveBurst.description: m,r 13, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 38 (5d12 + 6) Acid or Necrotic damage (Sammaster's choice).

ParalyzingTouch.name: ParalyzingTouch
ParalyzingTouch.description: m 13, reach 5 ft. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Cold damage, and the target has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition until the start of Sammaster's next turn.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Necrotic damage.

RuinousBreath{@recharge5}.name: RuinousBreath{@recharge5}
RuinousBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Time-WarpingBreath.name: Time-WarpingBreath
Time-WarpingBreath.description: wis DC 12, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} The target's Speed|XPHB is halved, it can't take Reactions, and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action|XPHB on its turn, not both. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

ExplosiveCore.name: Explosive Core
ExplosiveCore.description: When the spore is subjected to Fire damage, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the spore takes 7 (2d6) Fire damage.

RollingMass.name: Rolling Mass
RollingMass.description: The spore doesn't need to expend extra movement to move through Difficult Terrain|XPHB.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spore makes four Tendril attacks. Alternatively, it makes two Tendril attacks and uses Consume once.

Tendril.name: Tendril
Tendril.description: m 10, reach 20 ft. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Acid damage. If the target is Large or smaller, the spore pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

Consume.name: Consume
Consume.description: str DC 18, one Large or smaller creature within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is pulled into the spore's space and has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape 16). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded|XPHB and Restrained|XPHB conditions, and it takes 17 (5d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the spore's turns. When the spore moves, the Grappled|XPHB target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The spore can have one Large creature or up to nine Medium or smaller creatures Grappled|XPHB at a time.

Flyby(SwanFormOnly).name: Flyby (Swan Form Only)
Flyby(SwanFormOnly).description: The swanmay doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack action when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The swanmay makes two attacks, using Beak, Longbow, or Scimitar in any combination.

Beak(SwanFormOnly).name: Beak(SwanFormOnly)
Beak(SwanFormOnly).description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Scimitar(HumanoidFormOnly).name: Scimitar(HumanoidFormOnly)
Scimitar(HumanoidFormOnly).description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

Longbow(HumanoidFormOnly).name: Longbow(HumanoidFormOnly)
Longbow(HumanoidFormOnly).description: r 6, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

Mask.name: Mask
Mask.description: As a bonus action, Valindra can mask her shriveled flesh and appear to be a living elf. This magical illusion lasts until she ends it as a bonus action or until she uses her Frightening Gaze legendary action. The effect also ends if Valindra drops to 30 hit points or fewer, or if dispel magic is cast on her.

Preparation.name: Preparation
Preparation.description: When preparing her spells, Valindra can swap out any spell on her list of prepared spells for another wizard spell of the same level.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Valindra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If destroyed Valindra gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: Valindra has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

ParalyzingTouch.name: ParalyzingTouch
ParalyzingTouch.description: ms 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Flyby(WyvernorHybridFormOnly).name: Flyby (Wyvern or Hybrid Form Only)
Flyby(WyvernorHybridFormOnly).description: The werewyvern doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack action when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The werewyvern makes three attacks, using Javelin or Rend in any combination. It can replace one of these attacks with one Stinger attack.

Javelin(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Javelin(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Javelin(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: m,r 7, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

Stinger(WyvernorHybridFormOnly).name: Stinger(WyvernorHybridFormOnly)
Stinger(WyvernorHybridFormOnly).description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the werewyvern's next turn. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. con DC 16. {@actSaveFail} The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB, it instead becomes a Werewyvern under the DM's control and has 20 Hit Points|XPHB. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this werewyvern's curse for 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

NightmareBreath{@recharge5}.name: NightmareBreath{@recharge5}
NightmareBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a cloud of spores in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage, and it is frightened of the dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Time-Warping Breath.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 7, reach 10 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

RuinousBreath{@recharge5}.name: RuinousBreath{@recharge5}
RuinousBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 36 (8d8) Necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

AuraofDread.description: Creatures in a 10-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the Zhentilar have their Speeds halved while in the Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation. The Zhentilar can designate creatures to be unaffected by the aura.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Zhentilar makes three attacks, using Dooming Blade or Oppressive Ray in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

DoomingBlade.name: DoomingBlade
DoomingBlade.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

OppressiveRay.name: OppressiveRay
OppressiveRay.description: r 5, range 90 ft. on hit: 16 (3d10) Psychic damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Zhentilar makes two attacks, using Shortsword or Pistol in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Knock Down.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: r 4, range 80/320 ft. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing damage.

ChardalynSense.description: Zlan senses the emotions of anyone touching a piece of chardalyn within 100 miles of itself.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Zlan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zlan has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

NextoftheSeven(6/Year).description: If Zlan dies within 100 miles of a piece of chardalyn at least 4 inches long, it re-forms from that piece of chardalyn in 1d10 days, regaining all its Hit Points|XPHB. The new body appears in the unoccupied space nearest to the piece of chardalyn, and another lich's mind in the body seizes psychic control of the body.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 11, reach 10 ft. on hit: 12 (3d4 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 22 (4d10) Necrotic damage.

BewilderingBolt.name: BewilderingBolt
BewilderingBolt.description: r 11, range 120 ft. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn.

On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 60-foot cone. The dragon then gains 15 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

ShiftPerception(1/Day).description: The dragon can cast hallucinatory terrain, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 15-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage.

DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of psychic dissonance in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 42 (12d6) psychic damage, and until the end of its next turn, when the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, it must roll a d6 and reduce the total by the number rolled. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Tail.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SpiderClimb.description: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and can choose to leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two melee attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}
DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 60-foot-cone. Each creature in that cone must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 45 (13d6) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw

DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

GemAwakening(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}

On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.
