LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon turtle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon turtle doesn't require food or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon turtle makes one Bite or Tail attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (1d12 + 9) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) lightning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

SteamBreath{@recharge5}.name: SteamBreath{@recharge5}
SteamBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 20-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

WarpPerception(1/Day).name: Warp Perception
WarpPerception(1/Day).description: The dragon can cast mirage arcane, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}
DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of psychic dissonance in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 56 (16d6) psychic damage, and until the end of its next turn, when the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, it must roll a d8 and reduce the total by the number rolled. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 20-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) thunder damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}
DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 55 (10d10) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The sea serpent can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the sea serpent fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The sea serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack and one Constrict or Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) cold damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the sea serpent can't constrict another target.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 30 feet away from the sea serpent and knocked prone.

RimeBreath{@recharge5}.name: RimeBreath{@recharge5}
RimeBreath{@recharge5}.description: The sea serpent exhales a 60-foot cone of cold. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 49 (9d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

Fabricate(1/Day).name: Fabricate
Fabricate(1/Day).description: The dragon can cast fabricate, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}
DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 49 (14d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

ChromaticForm.name: Chromatic Form
ChromaticForm.description: When created, the animated breath takes one of five forms, matching its creator's breath weapon: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This form determines the creature's AC, damage resistance, traits, and attacks.

FireAura(FireFormOnly).name: Fire Aura (Fire Form Only)
FireAura(FireFormOnly).description: At the start of each of the animated breath's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the animated breath or hits it with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

PutridAura(AcidandPoisonFormsOnly).name: Putrid Aura (Acid and Poison Forms Only)
PutridAura(AcidandPoisonFormsOnly).description: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the animated breath must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. A creature that touches the animated breath or hits it with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The animated breath makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) damage of a type determined by the animated breath's form: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

PlatinumBrilliance(RechargesafteraShorto.name: Platinum Brilliance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
PlatinumBrilliance(RechargesafteraShorto.description: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, he recharges his Breath Weapon, and he regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Bahamut after his Platinum Brilliance activates.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If the aspect fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aspect makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) piercing damage plus 22 (4d10) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The aspect can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 27 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The aspect uses one of the following breath weapons:

ChromaticWrath(RechargesafteraShortorLon.description: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, she recharges her Chromatic Flames, and she regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Tiamat after her Chromatic Wrath activates.

On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) damage of a type of the aspect's choosing: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

ChromaticAwakening(RechargesafteraShorto.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
ChromaticAwakening(RechargesafteraShorto.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}
ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 5 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

GemAwakening(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
GemAwakening(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

MassTelekinesis(GemAwakeningOnly;Recharg.name: MassTelekinesis(GemAwakeningOnly;RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

MassTelekinesis(GemAwakeningOnly;Recharg.description: The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MultipleHeads.name: Multiple Heads
MultipleHeads.description: The dracohydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the dracohydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

ReactiveHeads.name: Reactive Heads
ReactiveHeads.description: For each head the dracohydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: While the dracohydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dracohydra makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) damage of a type chosen by the dracohydra: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

PrismaticBreath{@recharge4}.name: PrismaticBreath{@recharge4}
PrismaticBreath{@recharge4}.description: The dracohydra's heads exhale a single breath of multicolored energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 33 (6d10) damage of a type chosen by the dracohydra: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it bursts into flames and is reduced to ashes. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the draconian must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) fire damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

SerratedSword.name: SerratedSword
SerratedSword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

ControlledFall.name: Controlled Fall
ControlledFall.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into a puddle of acid and splashes acid on those around it. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Dagger attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of the target's next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its scales and flesh immediately shrivel away and its bones explode. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) force damage.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Trident or Necrotic Ray attacks.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

NecroticRay.name: NecroticRay
NecroticRay.description: rs 4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

EnergyRay.name: EnergyRay
EnergyRay.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}.name: NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}
NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}.description: The draconian exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

Deflection.name: Deflection
Deflection.description: The shard's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The shard can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. If it ends its turn inside an object, it takes 5 (1d10) force damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the shard fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When it drops to 0 hit points, the shard disappears and leaves a Tiny cracked gemstone in its space. The gemstone matches the kind of gem dragon it was in life and has AC 20, 15 hit points, and immunity to all damage except force. Unless the gemstone is destroyed, after 1d20 days, the gemstone dissipates and the shard re-forms, regaining all its hit points and appearing in the place the gemstone once occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The shard doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shard makes two Telekinetic Rend attacks.

TelekineticRend.name: TelekineticRend
TelekineticRend.description: ms,rs 12 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) force damage.

InhabitObject.name: InhabitObject
InhabitObject.description: The shard disappears as it pours its psychic essence into a Medium or smaller nonsentient object it can see within 30 feet of it, magically possessing it. The object uses the shard's AC, and any damage dealt to the object applies to the shard's hit points. The shard inhabits the object until it uses an action to leave; until it is turned; until it is reduced to 0 hit points; or until an effect that ends possession, such as a dispel evil and good spell, is used on it. When it leaves the object, it reappears in the nearest unoccupied space.

PsychicCrush{@recharge5}.name: PsychicCrush{@recharge5}
PsychicCrush{@recharge5}.description: The shard unleashes a pulse of psychic power. Each creature of the shard's choice in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on it must make a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 55 (10d10) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

SpikedClub.name: SpikedClub
SpikedClub.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands.

EyeoftheLaw.name: Eye of the Law
EyeoftheLaw.description: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

Mount.name: Mount
Mount.description: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

HammerofJustice.name: HammerofJustice
HammerofJustice.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

PacifyingPresence.name: PacifyingPresence
PacifyingPresence.description: Each creature of the archon's choice that the archon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its concentration on any spells or other effects, and becomes charmed by the archon for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The arclight phoenix doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

GroundedLightning.name: Grounded Lightning
GroundedLightning.description: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 (2d10) force damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

LightningForm.name: Lightning Form
LightningForm.description: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

CracklingDeath.name: Crackling Death
CracklingDeath.description: When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell. The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg's space.

ArclightTouch.name: ArclightTouch
ArclightTouch.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (6d8) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Aurelia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Aurelia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage, or 13 (1d10 + 8) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

Leadership.name: Leadership
Leadership.description: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a d10 to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.

Warleader'sHelix{@recharge5}.name: Warleader'sHelix{@recharge5}
Warleader'sHelix{@recharge5}.description: rs 17 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 54 (12d8) radiant damage, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature regains 27 (6d8) hit points.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The angel makes two melee attacks. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage. If the target is within 5 feet of any of the angel's allies, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

BattlefieldInspiration.name: BattlefieldInspiration
BattlefieldInspiration.description: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the angel's next turn, each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls and saving throws.

BolsteringPresence.name: Bolstering Presence
BolsteringPresence.description: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

FeedonFire.name: Feed on Fire
FeedonFire.description: If the weird takes fire damage from a spell or other magical effect, its size increases by one category. If there isn't enough room for the weird to increase in size, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. While the weird is Large or bigger, it makes Strength checks and saving throws with advantage. If the weird starts its turn at Gargantuan size, the weird releases energy in an explosion. Each creature within 30 feet of the weird must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. The weird's size then becomes Medium.

FormofFireandWater.name: Form of Fire and Water
FormofFireandWater.description: The weird can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the weird can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time the weird enters another creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

HeatedBody.name: Heated Body
HeatedBody.description: A creature that touches the weird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The weird sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, or 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage if the weird is Large or bigger.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vampire makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the vampire for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape DC 14) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

BloodWitchDance.name: Blood Witch Dance
BloodWitchDance.description: The witch can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by its hex spell that it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of the witch's choice.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the witch's darkvision.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The witch makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its shortsword.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Borborygmos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

PoorDepthPerception.name: Poor Depth Perception
PoorDepthPerception.description: Borborygmos has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: Borborygmos deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Borborygmos can use his Frightful Presence. He also makes two attacks: one with his maul and one with his stomp.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 13 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Borborygmos's choice that is within 60 feet of him and can see or hear him must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

LastLaugh.name: Last Laugh
LastLaugh.description: When the cackler dies, it releases a dying laugh that scars the minds of other nearby creatures. Each creature within 10 feet of the cackler must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The cackler can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 11 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

SpikedChain.name: SpikedChain
SpikedChain.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The krasis can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The krasis can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The krasis can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The krasis makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (6d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.description: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the dryad shared a language.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dryad makes three attacks, using its vine staff, its longbow, or both.

VineStaff.name: VineStaff
VineStaff.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or become restrained by twisting vines for 1 minute. A target restrained in this way can use an action to make a DC 17 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

SummonMount(1/Day).name: SummonMount(1/Day)
SummonMount(1/Day).description: The dryad magically summons a mount, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the dryad. The mount remains for 8 hours, until it or the dryad dies, or until the dryad dismisses it as an action. The mount uses the stat block of an elk (see the Monster Manual) with these changes: it is a plant instead of a beast, it has an Intelligence of 6, and it understands Sylvan but can't speak. While within 1 mile of the mount, the dryad can communicate with it telepathically.

SuppressMagic{@recharge5}.name: SuppressMagic{@recharge5}
SuppressMagic{@recharge5}.description: The dryad targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the dryad is incapacitated or dies, or until the dryad uses a bonus action to end the effect.

EmpoweredSpell(3/Day).name: Empowered Spell
EmpoweredSpell(3/Day).description: When the blastseeker rolls damage for a spell, it can reroll up to four dice of damage. It must use the new dice.

TidesofChaos(1/Day).name: Tides of Chaos
TidesofChaos(1/Day).description: The blastseeker makes one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with advantage.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

CounterfluxOvercast{@recharge5}.name: Counterflux Overcast {@recharge 5}
CounterfluxOvercast{@recharge5}.description: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a d6 to determine the effect:

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

ExploitationoftheDebtors.name: Exploitation of the Debtors
ExploitationoftheDebtors.description: As a bonus action, the angel targets a creature charmed by it that it can see within 30 feet of it. The angel deals 11 (2d10) necrotic damage to the target, and the angel gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The angel makes two attacks with its scythe. It can substitute Chains of Obligation for one of these attacks.

Scythe.name: Scythe
Scythe.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

ChainsofObligation.name: ChainsofObligation
ChainsofObligation.description: The angel targets one creature charmed by it that it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Charisma saving throw or become paralyzed for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The lich regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the lich takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the lich's next turn. The lich dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the lich to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the lich drops to 1 hit point instead.

NoxiousTouch.name: NoxiousTouch
NoxiousTouch.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The druid deals double damage to objects and structures.

SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.description: The druid can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.description: If the felidar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claws attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the felidar can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The felidar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The felidar's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The felidar makes two attacks with its claws.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

HealingTouch(3/Day).name: HealingTouch(3/Day)
HealingTouch(3/Day).description: The felidar touches another creature with its horns. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target

Teleport(1/Day).name: Teleport(1/Day)
Teleport(1/Day).description: The felidar magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the felidar is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The firefist makes two greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Relentless(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Relentless(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: If the angel takes 21 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The angel makes two melee attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 11 (1d10 + 6) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) fire or radiant damage (angel's choice).

FluxbendingOvercast{@recharge5}.name: Fluxbending Overcast {@recharge 5}
FluxbendingOvercast{@recharge5}.description: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a d6 to determine the effect: 1-3. The blastseeker teleports, swapping places with a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. 4-6. The blastseeker and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) thunder damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

AmplifyLightning.name: Amplify Lightning
AmplifyLightning.description: Whenever a spell that deals lightning damage includes one or more fluxchargers in its area, the spell deals an extra 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fluxcharger makes two slam attacks or uses Arc Lightning twice.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

ArcLightning.name: ArcLightning
ArcLightning.description: rs 7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d10) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the fluxcharger's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (3d8) lightning damage. {@hom}The fluxcharger takes 5 (1d10) force damage after resolving the attack.

FearFrenzy.name: Fear Frenzy
FearFrenzy.description: The horror has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.

FrighteningScreech{@recharge5}.name: FrighteningScreech{@recharge5}
FrighteningScreech{@recharge5}.description: The horror screeches. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the horror's Frightening Screech for the next 24 hours.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

GalvanicOvercast{@recharge5}.name: Galvanic Overcast {@recharge 5}
GalvanicOvercast{@recharge5}.description: When the blastseeker casts lightning bolt or thunderwave, it can roll a die. On an odd number, the blastseeker takes 9 (2d8) force damage. On an even number, the spell also deals 9 (2d8) lightning damage to each target that fails its saving throw.

HeartoftheStorm.name: Heart of the Storm
HeartoftheStorm.description: When the blastseeker casts lightning bolt or thunderwave, all other creatures within 10 feet of the blastseeker each take 3 lightning damage.

Gust-PropelledLeap.name: Gust-Propelled Leap
Gust-PropelledLeap.description: The blastseeker can use a bonus action to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the galvanice weird dies, it explodes in a burst of ice and lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding weird must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or lose the ability to use reactions until the start of the weird's next turn.

DeathLink.name: Death Link
DeathLink.description: If its specter rider is reduced to 0 hit points, the gloamwing is destroyed.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The gloamwing doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the gloamwing has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gloamwing makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The shaman has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

FungalRot.name: FungalRot
FungalRot.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three spear attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage, or 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

SpeakwithBeasts.name: Speak with Beasts
SpeakwithBeasts.description: The horncaller can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horncaller makes two melee attacks with its staff and uses One with the Worldsoul.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

OnewiththeWorldsoul.name: OnewiththeWorldsoul
OnewiththeWorldsoul.description: The horncaller chooses one beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the beast can hear the horncaller, the beast uses its reaction to make one melee attack against a target that the horncaller can see.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The hybrid can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hybrid makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

SpitAcid.name: SpitAcid
SpitAcid.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During its first turn, the hybrid poisoner has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hybrid scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

PoisonousSkin.name: Poisonous Skin
PoisonousSkin.description: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) poison damage.

ToxicTouch.name: ToxicTouch
ToxicTouch.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, it must repeat the save, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

ElectrifiedBody.name: Electrified Body
ElectrifiedBody.description: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The hybrid sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hybrid makes two attacks: one with its shocking touch and one with its tentacles.

ShockingTouch.name: ShockingTouch
ShockingTouch.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. on hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 11), and the hybrid pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward it. Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hybrid shocker can't use its tentacles on another creature.

ChameleonSkin.name: Chameleon Skin
ChameleonSkin.description: The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Isperia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Isperia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Isperia makes two claw attacks. She can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one claw attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

SupremeLegalAuthority.name: SupremeLegalAuthority
SupremeLegalAuthority.description: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful DC 23 Intelligence saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia's Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Jarad fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Jarad regains 25 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. He dies only if he starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SporeInfusion.name: Spore Infusion
SporeInfusion.description: Jarad is surrounded by a cloud of spores. As a bonus action, he can cause the spores to deal 11 (2d10) poison damage to a creature he can see within 10 feet of him.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces Jarad to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jarad makes two attacks: one with his Noxious Touch and one with his Staff of Svogthir. He can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one of these attacks.

NoxiousTouch.name: NoxiousTouch
NoxiousTouch.description: ms 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 28 (8d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

StaffofSvogthir.name: StaffofSvogthir
StaffofSvogthir.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage and 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

FeedonDeath.name: Feed on Death
FeedonDeath.description: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't incapacitated.

HiveMind.name: Hive Mind
HiveMind.description: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of 1 action.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

HiveMind.name: Hive Mind
HiveMind.description: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

Elusive.name: Elusive
Elusive.description: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is incapacitated.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Lazav fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

ShapechangerSavant.name: Shapechanger Savant
ShapechangerSavant.description: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

PsychicDefenses.name: Psychic Defenses
PsychicDefenses.description: Unless Lazav is incapacitated, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Lazav makes three shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before Lazav's next turn.

AuraofBloodLust.name: Aura of Blood Lust
AuraofBloodLust.description: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

FeedontheCrowd.name: Feed on the Crowd
FeedontheCrowd.description: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

CaptivatingPresence{@recharge}.name: CaptivatingPresence{@recharge}
CaptivatingPresence{@recharge}.description: Each creature within 120 feet of the master must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the master for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, a creature's speed is 0. If the charmed creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape DC 13) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

MindSiphon{@recharge5}.name: MindSiphon{@recharge5}
MindSiphon{@recharge5}.description: The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: The mage wears a Spies' Murmur|GGR|spies' murmur (see chapter 5).

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Mount.name: Mount
Mount.description: If the specter isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the specter can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The specter makes two scythe attacks.

Scythe.name: Scythe
Scythe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

MindTwist{@recharge5}.name: MindTwist{@recharge5}
MindTwist{@recharge5}.description: The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (5d8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

ReapMemory(3/Day).name: ReapMemory(3/Day)
ReapMemory(3/Day).description: The specter touches one incapacitated creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

LocusoftheFiremind.name: Locus of the Firemind
LocusoftheFiremind.description: Niv-Mizzet can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MasterChemister.name: Master Chemister
MasterChemister.description: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d4 + 9) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

CouncilofFive.name: Council of Five
CouncilofFive.description: The ghost has a trait based on who it is, as shown below:

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If the ghost fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

ConvenetheGhostCouncil.name: ConvenetheGhostCouncil
ConvenetheGhostCouncil.description: The ghost summons the other four members of the Obzedat. At the start of the ghost's next turn, the other members appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The ghosts each roll initiative when they appear.

Focus.name: Focus
Focus.description: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a d4 to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a d4 from its attack roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

GlimpsetheTemporalFlood{@recharge5}.name: GlimpsetheTemporalFlood{@recharge5}
GlimpsetheTemporalFlood{@recharge5}.description: The mage targets one creature within 120 feet of it that it can see. The target takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

CaptivatingPresence.name: Captivating Presence
CaptivatingPresence.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a DC 25 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

CruelEntertainment.name: Cruel Entertainment
CruelEntertainment.description: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

Curtain-CallScythe.name: Curtain-CallScythe
Curtain-CallScythe.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Nimble.name: Nimble
Nimble.description: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Nimble.name: Nimble
Nimble.description: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

BladedChain.name: BladedChain
BladedChain.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

SpewFlame{@recharge4}.name: SpewFlame{@recharge4}
SpewFlame{@recharge4}.description: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Nimble.name: Nimble
Nimble.description: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

BarbedPole.name: BarbedPole
BarbedPole.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

FirstStrike.name: First Strike
FirstStrike.description: The reckoner has advantage on initiative rolls.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: In the first round of a combat, the stalker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The stalker can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

RuinDweller.name: Ruin Dweller
RuinDweller.description: The stalker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in ruins, and its speed is not reduced in difficult terrain||3 composed of rubble.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The stalker deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The stalker makes three attacks with its shortsword.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: m 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

ExplosiveTank.name: Explosive Tank
ExplosiveTank.description: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

LightHammer.name: LightHammer
LightHammer.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Scorchbringer{@recharge4}.name: Scorchbringer{@recharge4}
