Scorchbringer{@recharge4}.description: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

ShadowStride.name: Shadow Stride
ShadowStride.description: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

LashingShadows{@recharge5}.name: LashingShadows{@recharge5}
LashingShadows{@recharge5}.description: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The amphisbaena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Doric makes two Shaped Claw or Sling attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

ShapedClaw.name: ShapedClaw
ShapedClaw.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Edgin makes two Reinforced Lute or Shortsword attacks.

ReinforcedLute.name: ReinforcedLute
ReinforcedLute.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) thunder damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) thunder damage.

DisorientingWords.name: DisorientingWords
DisorientingWords.description: Edgin magically taunts up to three creatures he can see within 60 feet of himself. Each creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of Edgin's next turn.

DisarmingCharm.name: Disarming Charm
DisarmingCharm.description: While Forge isn't wearing armor, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

Double-Cross.name: Double-Cross
Double-Cross.description: If Forge hits a creature friendly to him with an attack roll, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Forge is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Forge makes two Dagger attacks, two Heavy Crossbow attacks, or one of each.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) poison damage, and the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) poison damage. {@hom}If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of Forge's next turn.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of her turn, Holga can gain advantage on melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against her have advantage until the start of her next turn.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Holga carries a darksteel greataxe, a magic weapon that grants her resistance to lightning damage while she carries it (included above).

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While Holga isn't wearing armor, her AC includes her Constitution modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Holga makes three Darksteel Greataxe or Improvised Weapon attacks, in any combination.

DarksteelGreataxe.name: DarksteelGreataxe
DarksteelGreataxe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

ImprovisedWeapon.name: ImprovisedWeapon
ImprovisedWeapon.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Simon has advantage on saving throws he makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on himself, and magic can't put him to sleep.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Simon carries a bag of holding, two pairs of sending stones, and a deathly token (see Spellcasting).

WildMagic.name: Wild Magic
WildMagic.description: When Simon takes 20 or more damage from a single source or takes damage from a critical hit, he must roll on the Wild Magic Surge table in the Player's Handbook.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Simon makes three Quarterstaff or Chaos Bolt attacks. He can replace one attack with one use of Spellcasting.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

ChaosBolt.name: ChaosBolt
ChaosBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) damage of a random type determined by rolling a d8: 1, acid; 2, cold; 3, fire; 4, force; 5, lightning; 6, poison; 7, psychic; 8, thunder.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Sofina wears a magic robe that grants her a +2 bonus to AC and a +1 bonus to saving throws (included above).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sofina makes three Necrotic Strike attacks.

NecroticStrike.name: NecroticStrike
NecroticStrike.description: ms,rs 10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) necrotic damage.

SwarmofMeteors(1/Day).name: SwarmofMeteors(1/Day)
SwarmofMeteors(1/Day).description: Sofina magically calls down a meteor swarm that detonates in four 40-foot-radius spheres, each one centered on a point she can see within 1 mile of herself. These spheres can overlap. Each creature in one or more of these spheres must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) fire damage and 35 (10d6) bludgeoning damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in multiple spheres takes this damage only once.

AuraofProtection.name: Aura of Protection
AuraofProtection.description: Xenk and his allies within 10 feet of him have advantage on saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Xenk makes three Daggersword attacks and uses Daggersword Flourish. He can replace Daggersword Flourish with Cleansing Touch if it's available.

Daggersword.name: Daggersword
Daggersword.description: Choose the attack that corresponds to the daggersword's current form (see Daggersword Shift below):

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: Xenk magically detaches the longsword's blade from its hilt, launching the blade at a creature he can see within 30 feet of himself. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is impaled by the blade, taking 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, and is knocked prone. At the end of the current turn, the blade magically reattaches to its hilt.

ShortswordandDagger.name: ShortswordandDagger
ShortswordandDagger.description: Xenk lashes out with both weapons. Each creature of his choice within 10 feet of him must make a DC 16 Dexterity throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of Xenk's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

DaggerswordFlourish.name: DaggerswordFlourish
DaggerswordFlourish.description: Choose the option that corresponds to the daggersword's current form (see Daggersword Shift below):

CleansingTouch(1/Day).name: CleansingTouch(1/Day)
CleansingTouch(1/Day).description: Xenk touches a creature within 5 feet of himself. The target magically regains 27 (6d8) hit points and gains the benefit of a lesser restoration spell.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Demogorgon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Demogorgon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: Demogorgon has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, deafened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Demogorgon makes two tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

Gaze.name: Gaze
Gaze.description: Demogorgon turns his magical gaze toward one creature that he can see within 120 feet of him. That target must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the target is incapacitated, it can avert its eyes to avoid the gaze and to automatically succeed on the save. If the target does so, it can't see Demogorgon until the start of his next turn. If the target looks at him in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thessalhydra makes one maw attack and one Flurry of Bites.

FlurryofBites.name: FlurryofBites
FlurryofBites.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (4d4) poison damage.

Maw.name: Maw
Maw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage.

TailPincer.name: TailPincer
TailPincer.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, and the target is grappled. As an action, the target can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (its choice). Until this grapple ends, the thessalhydra can't use its tail pincer.

AcidSaliva{@recharge5}.name: AcidSaliva{@recharge5}
AcidSaliva{@recharge5}.description: The thessalhydra spits a glob of acid at a point it can see within 30 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The curate has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

RaisetheDead(1/Day).name: Raise the Dead
RaisetheDead(1/Day).description: In a ritual that takes 8 hours, the curate touches a creature that has died within the past 7 days. That creature returns to life with 1 Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point. The curate can't revive a creature that died of old age.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The curate makes three Celestial Radiance attacks.

CelestialRadiance.name: CelestialRadiance
CelestialRadiance.description: m,r 7, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

Healer'sTouch(2/Day).name: Healer'sTouch(2/Day)
Healer'sTouch(2/Day).description: The curate touches another creature. That creature regains 13 (2d8 + 4) Hit Points|XPHB.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

CorrosiveForm.name: Corrosive Form
CorrosiveForm.description: Whenever a creature hits the ooze with a melee attack, that creature takes 2 Acid damage.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) Acid damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ivlis makes three Chaos Blast attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Sinister Command if available.

ChaosBlast.name: ChaosBlast
ChaosBlast.description: m,r 4, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 7 (2d6) damage. Roll 1d4 to determine the damage type: 1, Acid; 2, Cold; 3, Fire; 4, Lightning.

SinisterCommand{@recharge5}.name: SinisterCommand{@recharge5}
SinisterCommand{@recharge5}.description: wis DC 12, one creature Ivlis can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed|XPHB, the target has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

QuickDisguise.name: Quick Disguise
QuickDisguise.description: Jacko spends 1 minute to disguise himself as a different Humanoid of approximately his height and weight. While Jacko is disguised, a creature that takes the Study action to inspect Jacko's appearance can make a DC 13 Intelligence (Investigation|XPHB) check, discerning his disguise on a successful check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jacko makes two Poison Dagger attacks.

PoisonDagger.name: PoisonDagger
PoisonDagger.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

BrineSlicer.name: BrineSlicer
BrineSlicer.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lizardfolk makes one Bite attack and one Bone Pike attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

BonePike.name: BonePike
BonePike.description: m 4, reach 10 ft. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing damage.

PoisonSpit.name: PoisonSpit
PoisonSpit.description: r 4, range 60 ft. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) Poison damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Narthus makes two attacks using Vile Mace or Fateful Bolt in any combination.

VileMace.name: VileMace
VileMace.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Necrotic damage.

FatefulBolt.name: FatefulBolt
FatefulBolt.description: r 4, range 120 ft. on hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of Narthus's next turn has Advantage|XPHB.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: r 5, range 80/320 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

NeedleSword.name: NeedleSword
NeedleSword.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage.

EnchantingBow.name: EnchantingBow
EnchantingBow.description: r 6, range 40/160 ft. on hit: 1 Piercing damage, and the target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the start of the sprite's next turn.

HeartSight.name: HeartSight
HeartSight.description: cha DC 10, one creature within 5 feet the sprite can see (Celestials, Fiends, Undead automatically fail the save). {@actSaveFail} The sprite knows the target's emotions.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The sprite has the Invisible|XPHB condition for 1 minute. This effect ends early immediately after the sprite makes an attack roll or deals damage, or if the sprite has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Vinx makes two attacks, using Shortsword and Sling in any combination.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: r 4, range 30/120 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the wight has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wight makes two attacks, using Necrotic Sword or Necrotic Bow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Drink Life.

NecroticSword.name: NecroticSword
NecroticSword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

NecroticBow.name: NecroticBow
NecroticBow.description: r 4, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

DrinkLife{@recharge5}.name: DrinkLife{@recharge5}
DrinkLife{@recharge5}.description: con DC 13, one creature within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 6 (1d8 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the wight regains a number of Hit Points|XPHB equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SurpriseAttack.name: Surprise Attack
SurpriseAttack.description: If the drake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Azbara has two spell scroll (1st level)||scrolls of mage armor.

PotentCantrips.name: Potent Cantrips
PotentCantrips.description: When Azbara casts an evocation Cantrips and misses, or the target succeeds on its saving throw, the target still takes half the cantrip's damage but suffers no other effect.

SculptSpells.name: Sculpt Spells
SculptSpells.description: When Azbara casts an evocation spell that affects other creatures that he can see, he can choose a number of them equal to 1+the spell's level to succeed on their saving throws against the spell. Those creatures take no damage if they would normally take half damage from the spell.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ettin makes two attacks: one with its battleaxe and one with its morningstar.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: The ettin's right head exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ColdBreath{@recharge5}.name: ColdBreath{@recharge5}
ColdBreath{@recharge5}.description: The ettin's left head exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Gaze.name: Gaze
Gaze.description: The ettin turns its magical gaze toward one creature that it can see within 120 feet of it. That target must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the target is incapacitated, it can avert its eyes to avoid the gaze and to automatically succeed on the save. If the target does so, it can't see the ettin until the start of the ettin's next turn. If the target looks at the ettin in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

BeguilingGaze.name: BeguilingGaze
BeguilingGaze.description: The target is stunned until the start of the ettin's next turn or until the ettin is no longer within line of sight.

HypnoticGaze.name: HypnoticGaze
HypnoticGaze.description: The target is charmed by the ettin until the start of the ettin's next turn. The ettin chooses how the charmed target uses its actions, reactions, and movement.

InsanityGaze.name: InsanityGaze
InsanityGaze.description: The target suffers the effect of the confusion spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the start of the ettin's next turn. The ettin doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: Krenko can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Krenko makes two attacks with his scimitar.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage..

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The rig is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rig must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

Unstable.name: Unstable
Unstable.description: If the rig takes damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated with a speed of 0 until a creature activates it with a successful DC 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check made as an action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The armor makes two melee attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

EphemeralMovement.name: Ephemeral Movement
EphemeralMovement.description: The incarnation can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain|XPHB, and its movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The incarnation has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The incarnation makes three attacks, using Bite or Miasmic Globule in any combination.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 8, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage.

MiasmicGlobule.name: MiasmicGlobule
MiasmicGlobule.description: r 8, range 60/120 ft. on hit: 15 (6d4) Acid damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB is reduced by 10 feet until the end of the incarnation's next turn.

SpectralStampede.name: SpectralStampede
SpectralStampede.description: The incarnation moves up to 80 feet in a straight line. Each creature whose space the incarnation enters is targeted once by the following effect. dex DC 16. {@actSaveFail} 18 (4d8) Force damage. If the target is the incarnation's size or smaller, it has the Prone|XPHB condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The incarnation has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The incarnation makes two Vine attacks and uses Radiant Blast. It can replace one vine attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Blindness/Deafness|XPHB if available.

Vine.name: Vine
Vine.description: m 9, reach 20 ft. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is the incarnation's size or smaller, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 15) from one of two vines.

RadiantBlast.name: RadiantBlast
RadiantBlast.description: con DC 17, each creature of the incarnation's choice in a 20-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the incarnation. {@actSaveFail} The creature takes 14 (2d8 + 5) Radiant damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Stone Sword or Boulder in any combination.

StoneSword.name: StoneSword
StoneSword.description: m 8, reach 15 ft. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) Slashing damage.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: r 8, range 60/240 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The merrow can breathe air and water.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The merrow can mimic voices and animal sounds. A creature that hears the mimicries can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Insight|XPHB) check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The merrow makes three Spined Tail attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of Spellcasting to cast Command|XPHB.

SpinedTail.name: SpinedTail
SpinedTail.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The merrow can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The merrow makes three attacks, using Coral Scepter and Poisoned|XPHB Longbow in any combination.

CoralScepter.name: CoralScepter
CoralScepter.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

PoisonedLongbow.name: PoisonedLongbow
PoisonedLongbow.description: r 7, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

Invective.name: Invective
Invective.description: wis DC 15, up to three creatures the merrow can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 (4d6) Psychic damage, and the creature has Disadvantage|XPHB on its next attack roll before the end of the merrow's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The noggle deals double damage to objects and structures.

SabotagingSwipe.name: SabotagingSwipe
SabotagingSwipe.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage. If the target is wearing armor, it is subjected to the following effect. dex DC 12. {@actSaveFail} The armor takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The target can take an action to remove the penalty from its armor.

BloodiedWildMagic.name: Bloodied Wild Magic
BloodiedWildMagic.description: While Bloodied|XPHB, the noggle has a Fly Speed|XPHB of 30 feet and it can choose for any damage it deals to be Force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The noggle makes two attacks, using Noggling Stick or Befuddling Ray in any combination.

NogglingStick.name: NogglingStick
NogglingStick.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Psychic damage.

BefuddlingRay.name: BefuddlingRay
BefuddlingRay.description: r 5, range 60 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target subtracts 1d4 from the next saving throw it makes before the end of the noggle's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes three attacks, using Tree Club or Boulder in any combination.

TreeClub.name: TreeClub
TreeClub.description: m 9, reach 15 ft. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: r 9, range 60/240 ft. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

WildMagicCataclysm{@recharge5}.name: WildMagicCataclysm{@recharge5}
WildMagicCataclysm{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 28 (8d6) damage (roll 1d4 to determine damage type: 1Acid; 2Fire; 3Lightning; 4Thunder). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

DetectSentience.name: Detect Sentience
DetectSentience.description: The brain can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The brain doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

blindsight.name: blindsight
blindsight.value: 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius); see also "detect sentience" below

ChillTouch(Cantrip).name: ChillTouch(Cantrip)
ChillTouch(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the brain's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against the brain until the end of the brain's next turn.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.name: MindBlast{@recharge5}
MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The brain magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The clockwork kraken has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

IndependentTentacles.name: Independent Tentacles
IndependentTentacles.description: The clockwork kraken has eight tentacles, each of which is treated as a Medium creature, moves independently on the construct's turn, and has a flying speed of 40 feet. The clockwork kraken's senses operate through its tentacles as well as its main body. Each tentacle can be attacked independently, with damage dealt to tentacles applied to the clockwork kraken's hit point total. A tentacle is destroyed if it takes more than 20 damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The clockwork kraken makes four tentacle slam attacks.

TentacleSlam.name: TentacleSlam
TentacleSlam.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

AshPuff.name: Ash Puff
AshPuff.description: The first time the zombie takes damage, any living creature within 5 feet of the zombie must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or gain disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on it early with a successful save.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

HearthofMoonlightandShadow.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
HearthofMoonlightandShadow.description: At the start of a short or long rest, Amble can touch a point in space, and an invisible, 30-foot-radius sphere of magic appears, centered on that point. Cover||3||Total cover blocks the sphere.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: Amble can hold their breath for up to 1 hour at a time.

BalmoftheSummerCourt(12d6).name: Balm of the Summer Court (12d6)
BalmoftheSummerCourt(12d6).description: (As a Bonus Action) Amble can choose one creature they can see within 120 feet of them and spend up to 6d6 of their die pool. Roll the spent dice and add them together. The target regains a number of hit points equal to the total. The target also gains 1 temporary hit point per die spent. Amble regains all expended dice when they finish a long rest.

HiddenPaths(4/Day).name: Hidden Paths
HiddenPaths(4/Day).description: (As a Bonus Action) Amble may teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

ChangeShape(2/Day).name: ChangeShape(2/Day)
ChangeShape(2/Day).description: Amble magically polymorphs into a beast with a challenge rating of 1 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 6 hours. Amble's equipment melds with their new form. Amble reverts to their true form if they die or fall unconscious. Amble can revert to their true form using a bonus action on their turn.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 6 to hit (8 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alax makes two Fire Strike attacks.

FireStrike.name: FireStrike
FireStrike.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage.

BreathWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: BreathWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Breath Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

BreathWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: Alax exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The achaierai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The achaierai makes two attacks with its Talons and one attack with its Beak.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

InfernalTracker.name: Infernal Tracker
InfernalTracker.description: Aribeth knows the distance to and direction of any creature that has broken a pact with Mephistopheles, even if the creature and Aribeth are on different planes of existence.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Aribeth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description: Aribeth is accompanied by a nightmare. The nightmare allows Aribeth to use it as a mount.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Aribeth regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If Aribeth takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Aribeth's next turn. Aribeth's body is destroyed only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Shadows.name: Shadows
Shadows.description: Three shadow||shadows hide within the saddle of Aribeth's nightmare. These shadows only come out if there is a creature within 30 feet that is at 0 hit points. When that happens, a shadow emerges and attacks the creature in order to make it fail a death saving throw. It continues to do so until the creature is dead.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Aribeth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalweaponsthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalweaponsthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalweaponsthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Aribeth makes three Void or Unholy Strike attacks.

Void.name: Void
Void.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the sword Void dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

UnholyStrike.name: UnholyStrike
UnholyStrike.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) necrotic damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Baalzebul's darkvision.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Baalzebul regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Baalzebul dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

LordofFlies.name: Lord of Flies
LordofFlies.description: Insects don't attack Baalzebul, and he can issue orders to them.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Baalzebul fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Baalzebul has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

StenchoftheSlug.name: Stench of the Slug
StenchoftheSlug.description: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of Baalzebul must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature is immune to this stench for 1 hour.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Baalzebul uses Heart of Pestilence (if available), then makes three Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

PungentEruption{@recharge4}.name: PungentEruption{@recharge4}
PungentEruption{@recharge4}.description: Baalzebul causes refuse and caustic liquid to spill from the ground at a point he can see within 300 feet. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. Targets take 36 (8d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save have the poisoned condition for 1 minute.

HeartofPestilence{@recharge5}.name: HeartofPestilence{@recharge5}
HeartofPestilence{@recharge5}.description: Baalzebul channels pestilence into his body, sickening creatures within 50 feet that can see him. Sickened creatures must make a DC 21 Charisma saving throw, followed by a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. Failing the Charisma save makes a creature have the frightened condition, while failing the Constitution save makes a creature weak. While weakened, a creature deals half damage on melee attacks. Both effects last for 1 minute or until a greater restoration spell or similar is cast.

DarkSight.name: Dark Sight
DarkSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the bebilith's darkvision.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The bebilith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down, without needing to make an ability check and ignores any movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bebilith uses Poisoned Web (if available) and then makes one Bite attack and two Foreleg attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage. Any creature that drops to zero hit points because of this attack ignites, suffering 7 (2d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns until the creature's hit points are above zero.

Foreleg.name: Foreleg
Foreleg.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) slashing damage.

PoisonedWeb{@recharge5}.name: PoisonedWeb{@recharge5}
PoisonedWeb{@recharge5}.description: rw 10 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. on hit: 51 (10d8 + 6) poison damage, and the target has the restrained condition until free of the web. While restrained, the target takes 9 (2d8) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target may use an action to make a DC 17 Strength check and if successful they are freed from the webbing. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 12; 10 hit points; immunity to bludgeoning, fire, poison, and psychic damage). If an attack or spell doing fire damage is used on the webbing, the webbing ignites (but is otherwise unharmed). Any creature restrained by the webbing suffers an additional 7 (2d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turn.

AvatarofBhaal.name: Avatar of Bhaal
AvatarofBhaal.description: When the ravager drops to 0 hit points, its form fractures. Within the next 24 hours, it will reappear in its Bhaal, Slayer|MaBJoV|slayer form within 2d6 miles of where the ravager form fell.

CulltheWeak.name: Cull the Weak
CulltheWeak.description: When the ravager damages a creature with a melee attack and the target is left with 20 or fewer remaining hit points, the creature must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be reduced to 0 hit points.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The ravager is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the ravager fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ravager has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The ravager's Claw, Bite, and Spines attacks are magical.

SpikedHide.name: Spiked Hide
SpikedHide.description: At the start of each of its turns, the ravager deals 16 (3d10) piercing damage to any creature grappling it or being grappled by it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ravager makes one Bite attack and then either two Claw attacks or two Spines attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Large or smaller creatures damaged by this attack are grappled (escape 20) and the ravager can't make another Bite attack until this grapple ends.

Spines.name: Spines
Spines.description: rw 14 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage. If the target fails a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, they are stunned until the end of their next turn.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During its first turn, the slayer has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the slayer scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the slayer's darkvision.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The slayer is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form, except for its Ravager Form ability.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the slayer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The slayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The slayer's claw attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The slayer makes four Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Bodhi fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Bodhi regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn if she has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Bodhi is destroyed, her body immediately appears in her resting place. She is paralyzed until she regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 24 hours in her resting place with 0 hit points, she regains 1 hit point. While paralyzed in this manner, if a creature within 60 feet says her name 9 times, Bodhi is permanently destroyed.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Bodhi deals an extra 28 (8d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Bodhi that isn't incapacitated and Bodhi doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Bodhi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SummonedByName(1/Day).name: Summoned By Name
SummonedByName(1/Day).description: If a creature says Bodhi Irenicus's full name 9 times in a row, Bodhi hears her name and becomes aware of the creature. Bodhi knows the exact location and name of the creature that spoke her name. She can then choose, as a free action, to teleport to a location adjacent to the creature. She must choose to do this within 1 minute of hearing her name. This power works even if the creature is on a different plane of existence. 1 minute after teleporting, Bodhi teleports back to where she was located when she heard her name spoken. This occurs even if Bodhi is unwilling and even if she is in an antimagic effect.

VampireWeaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
VampireWeaknesses.description: Bodhi Irenicus has the following flaws:

Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).name: Multiattack(VampireFormOnly)
Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).description: Bodhi makes three Unarmed Strike attacks, one of which can be a Bite attack instead.

UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly).name: UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly)
UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly).description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Bodhi can grapple a Medium-sized or smaller target (escape DC 18).

Bite(PantherorVampireFormOnly).name: Bite(PantherorVampireFormOnly)
Bite(PantherorVampireFormOnly).description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Bodhi regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Bodhi's control.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: If Bodhi isn't in sunlight, she can polymorph into a Medium panther or back into her true form. While in panther form, Bodhi Irenicus can't speak, her walking speed is 40 feet, and she has a climb speed of 30 feet. Her statistics, other than her size and speed, are unchanged. Anything she is wearing transforms with her, but nothing she is carrying does. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: Bodhi targets one Humanoid she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see Bodhi, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by Bodhi. The charmed target regards Bodhi as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under Bodhi's control, it takes Bodhi's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can. Each time Bodhi or her allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until Bodhi is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

BoltsofUndeadSlaying.name: Bolts of Undead Slaying
BoltsofUndeadSlaying.description: Borivik has a half-dozen bolts of undead slaying. If he strikes an Undead creature with one of these magic bolts, it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking an extra 33 (6d10) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much extra damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Borivik makes two Shortsword attacks or two Heavy Crossbow attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 9 to hit, ranged 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Doc Watson has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Portent{@recharge}.name: Portent {@recharge}
Portent{@recharge}.description: When Doc Watson or a creature he can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, Doc Watson can roll a d20 and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check. This trait recharges after using the Spellcasting action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Doc Watson makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) lightning damage.

ColdAura.name: Cold Aura
ColdAura.description: At the start of each of Cryonax's turns, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 21 (6d6) cold damage. A creature also takes 21 (6d6) cold damage if they touch or hit Cryonax. Nonmagical weapons that hit Cryonax are frozen immediately after dealing damage to Cryonax. If used again and they hit any creature, the weapon shatters. The freezing effect disappears after an hour.

EmpoweredAttacks.name: Empowered Attacks
EmpoweredAttacks.description: Cryonax's Slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

IceWalker.name: Ice Walker
IceWalker.description: No ability checks are required when Cryonax walks or climbs across icy surfaces and difficult snow or ice terrain does not cost him extra movement.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Cryonax fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Cryonax has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Cryonax makes two Slam attacks with his tentacles or two Ice Spear attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 20). Cryonax can grapple up to two targets but any tentacle that is grappling can't be used to make a Slam or Ice Spear attack.

IceSpear.name: IceSpear
IceSpear.description: rw 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (6d10 + 3) cold damage.

SummonFrostHorde(1/Day).name: SummonFrostHorde(1/Day)
SummonFrostHorde(1/Day).description: Cryonax summons two young white dragon||young white dragons or a frost giant with two yeti||yetis. The summoning costs Cryonax 50 hit points. The summoned creatures have maximum hit points and appear within 100 feet of Cryonax.

DraconicTransformation.name: Draconic Transformation
DraconicTransformation.description: When Dagryn drops to 0 hit points, instead of falling unconscious, he transforms into his dragon form. He immediately gains all the statistics of an adult black dragon with the exception that his size is Medium, and has the stunned condition. At the start of his next turn, he grows to Large size, but remains stunned. At the start of his subsequent turn, Dagryn grows to Huge size and is no longer stunned. Dagryn remains in his dragon form for 24 hours whereupon he reverts to this stat block.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: Dagryn has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Eruption.name: Eruption
Eruption.description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) acid damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Darien can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet

EldritchMind.name: Eldritch Mind
EldritchMind.description: Darien has advantage on Constitution saving throws that she makes to maintain concentration on a spell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Darien makes two War Pick attacks.

WarPick.name: WarPick
WarPick.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 necrotic damage.

EldritchBlast.name: EldritchBlast
EldritchBlast.description: rs 8 to hit, range 300 ft., three targets. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.

CreateThrall.name: CreateThrall
CreateThrall.description: Darien touches an incapacitated Humanoid. That creature is then charmed by her until a remove curse spell is cast on it, the charmed condition is removed from it, or she uses this feature again. Darien can communicate telepathically with the charmed creature as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence.

SummonWarPick.name: SummonWarPick
SummonWarPick.description: Darien creates a magical war pick in her empty hand. The war pick counts as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. The war pick has a +1 bonus to attack and damage (already factored into Darien's attacks).

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The deep spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: While in contact with a web, the deep spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The deep spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The deep spider makes one Bite attack and two Foreleg attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and has the paralyzed condition while poisoned in this way.

Foreleg.name: Foreleg
Foreleg.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: The dread doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The dread doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium Humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

SurpriseAttack.name: Surprise Attack
SurpriseAttack.description: If the dread doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 17 (5d6) damage from the attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dread doppelganger makes three Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 9 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6).

ReadThoughts.name: ReadThoughts
ReadThoughts.description: The dread doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 ft. of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the dread doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the dread doppelganger's Concentration isn't broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

Contingency.name: Contingency
Contingency.description: If Edwin has the incapacitated, paralyzed, or stunned condition, a contingency spell triggers, casting dispel magic at 6th level, targeting Edwin. He also has a body created by the clone spell stored in a cavern one mile beneath the city of Baldur's Gate.

Simulacrum.name: Simulacrum
Simulacrum.description: Edwin is always accompanied by a simulacrum of himself. The copy is identical to him in all respects except that it has 58 hit points, does not have the staff of power and can only cast the 'at will' spells available in Edwin's Spellcasting feature.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Edwin wields a staff of power. While held the staff grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and a +2 bonus to armor class, saving throws, and spell attack rolls (all factored into Edwin's statistics).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Edwin makes a Staff of Power attack or uses Spellcasting or Staff Spellcasting. He then makes two Elemental Blast attacks.

StaffofPower.name: StaffofPower
StaffofPower.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands. Edwin can expend one of the staff's charges to deal an extra 14 (4d6) force damage on a hit.

ElementalBlast.name: ElementalBlast
ElementalBlast.description: rs 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 38 (6d10 + 5) acid, cold, lightning, or fire damage.

Edwin'sChokingCloud{@recharge}.name: Edwin'sChokingCloud{@recharge}
Edwin'sChokingCloud{@recharge}.description: Edwin creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of poisonous fog centered on a point within 120 feet. The cloud spreads around corners but lasts only until the start of Edwin's next turn. When a creature enters the cloud's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures are affected even if they hold their breath or don't need to breathe.

LightningAffinity.name: Lightning Affinity
LightningAffinity.description: When Eo uses Spellcasting to cast a spell that deals lightning damage, that spell deals an additional 5 damage. When Eo casts a spell that deals a type of damage from the following list, she can change that damage type to lightning: acid, cold, fire, poison, thunder.

TwinnedOrbs.name: TwinnedOrbs
TwinnedOrbs.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., two targets. on hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison or thunder damage (Eo's choice).

TwinnedSpell.name: TwinnedSpell
TwinnedSpell.description: Eo uses Spellcasting to cast banishment, dominate person, finger of death, or power word stun. This spell targets a second creature in range.

Discharge(1/Day).name: Discharge(1/Day)
Discharge(1/Day).description: Eo emits a thin green ray at a creature within 60 feet. The target must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the target takes 89 (14d6 + 40) force damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated. A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a true resurrection or a wish spell.

StaffoftheWoodlands.name: Staff of the Woodlands
StaffoftheWoodlands.description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it and grants Faldorn a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls (already factored into Faldorn's attacks). The staff has 10 charges. It regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges each dawn. Faldorn can use an action to expend 1 or more of the staff's charges to cast one of the following spells from it, with a spell save DC of 14:

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Faldorn makes two Staff of the Woodlands attacks and uses Spellcasting. Or she uses Spellcasting and then Change Shape if available.

StaffoftheWoodlands.name: StaffoftheWoodlands
StaffoftheWoodlands.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

Shadowlight{@recharge}.name: Shadowlight{@recharge}
Shadowlight{@recharge}.description: A beam of dim light emerges from Faldorn in a 5-foot-wide, 300-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) radiant damage and is blinded until Faldorn's next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

ChangeShape(2/Day).name: ChangeShape(2/Day)
ChangeShape(2/Day).description: Faldorn magically polymorphs into a Beast or Elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. Faldorn reverts to her true form if she dies or falls unconscious. She can revert to her true form using a bonus action on her turn. While in a new form, Faldorn retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, and Dexterity are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks. She can cast her spells with verbal or somatic components in her new form. The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

AdhesiveSlime.name: Adhesive Slime
AdhesiveSlime.description: The farastu secretes a thick, tar-like slime and it can choose to use this slime to secure enemies that it has grappled or to make weapons become attached to it. It is able to end the adhesion with a bonus action, causing all items and creatures secured to it to be released. The adhesion also ends after the farastu dies.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the farastu's darkvision.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The farastu has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The farastu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The farastu's weapon attacks are magical.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the farastu can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The farastu makes one Bite attack and two Claws attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target is held fast by the farastu's adhesive slime (grappled condition, escape DC 15) if the farastu isn't already grappling a creature.

BattleSmith.name: Battle Smith
BattleSmith.description: Flimp uses his Intelligence modifier for attack and damage rolls with his weapons.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: Flimp has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws against magic.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Flimp wears a cloak of the manta ray, a cloak of protection, +2 plate armor, and winged boots. Flimp wields a +2 warhammer. These items vanish 4 days after Flimp dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Flimp makes two Magic Warhammer attacks.

MagicWarhammer.name: MagicWarhammer
MagicWarhammer.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

HurlAcid{@recharge}.name: HurlAcid{@recharge}
HurlAcid{@recharge}.description: Flimp hurls a vial of acid at a location within 60 feet. Every creature within 10 feet of the target location must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) acid damage.

SummonSteelDefender(1/Day).name: SummonSteelDefender(1/Day)
SummonSteelDefender(1/Day).description: Flimp summons a Steel Defender|TCE|metallic panther to aid him in combat. The panther has 24 hit points and is immune to poison damage and the poison and charmed conditions.

AversiontoFire.name: Aversion to Fire
AversiontoFire.description: If the gibberling takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

IncessantGibberish.name: Incessant Gibberish
IncessantGibberish.description: Any non-gibberling that is within 30 feet of the gibberling and doesn't have the deafened condition has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on spells and similar effects.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hamadryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.description: The hamadryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

TreeStride.name: Tree Stride
TreeStride.description: Once on her turn, the hamadryad can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large in size or bigger.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hamadryad makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Imoen is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Imoen instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Imoen deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Imoen that isn't incapacitated and Imoen doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Imoen can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Imoen has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Imoen makes two Shortsword attacks and one Hand Crossbow attack.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 30/210 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Jaheira has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Jaheira to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jaheira makes three Quarterstaff attacks.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) thunder damage.

CleansingPlague{@recharge}.name: CleansingPlague{@recharge}
CleansingPlague{@recharge}.description: Jaheira targets a creature she can see within 60 feet and causes a swarm of flying insects to cover the creature. The creature must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target fails their saving throw they are also blinded until the end of their next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Jon Irenicus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If he has a phylactery and he is destroyed, Jon Irenicus gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Jon Irenicus carries a rod of lordly might. He can use a bonus action to switch it between its Mace|PHB and Flame Tongue attacks.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: Jon Irenicus has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

Multiattack(onlyuseablewithTransformatio.name: Multiattack(onlyuseablewithTransformation)
Multiattack(onlyuseablewithTransformatio.description: Jon Irenicus makes two Flame Tongue attacks or two Mace attacks. Each attack is made with advantage and does an additional 13 (2d12) force damage if it hits.

FlameTongue(RodofLordlyMight).name: FlameTongue(RodofLordlyMight)
FlameTongue(RodofLordlyMight).description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) slashing damage and 7 (2d6) fire damage.

Mace(RodofLordlyMight).name: Mace(RodofLordlyMight)
Mace(RodofLordlyMight).description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

BreathofDeath(1/Day).name: BreathofDeath(1/Day)
BreathofDeath(1/Day).description: Jon Irenicus emits a 90-foot cone of necrotic energy. Each creature in the effects area must make a DC 21 saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, half as much damage on a successful one.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Kagain wields a +3 greataxe. While Kagain is attuned to this weapon, his hit point maximum increases to 178. Whenever a hostile creature damages Kagain while the axe is in his possession, he must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or go berserk. He can choose to fail this saving throw. While berserk, Kagain gains advantage on all melee attacks and attacks made against him are made with advantage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kagain makes three attacks with his Berserking Greataxe.

BerserkingGreataxe.name: BerserkingGreataxe
BerserkingGreataxe.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d12 + 7) slashing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the kelubar's darkvision.

FreedomofMovement.name: Freedom of Movement
FreedomofMovement.description: The kelubar is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical affects don't reduce its speed or cause it to be paralyzed or restrained. If the kelubar spends 5 feet of movement is automatically escapes from nonmagical restraints or a creature that has it grappled. It is also able to move underwater with no movement or attack penalties.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The kelubar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The kelubar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The kelubar's weapon attacks are magical.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the kelubar can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: The kelubar deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the kelubar that isn't incapacitated and the kelubar doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature that is not a demodand and starts its turn within 30 feet of the kelubar must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of this kelubar for 1 hour.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kelubar makes one Bite attack and three Claws attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Kivan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Kivan to sleep.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: Kivan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kivan makes three Longsword attacks or three Longbow attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 7 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Volley(2/Day).name: Volley(2/Day)
Volley(2/Day).description: Kivan makes a Longbow attack against any number of creatures he can see within 150 feet. He must make a separate attack roll with advantage for each target.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: Lothar can mimic simple sounds he has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Insight) check.

bludgeoningdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsth.name: bludgeoning damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

piercingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: piercing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
