slashingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

Greataxe(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Greataxe(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Greataxe(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, 14 (1d12 + 8) while in a rage.

Beak(RavenorHybridFormOnly).name: Beak(RavenorHybridFormOnly)
Beak(RavenorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Lothar can use his action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid, or into a Small raven, or back into his true form, which is Humanoid. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. Lothar reverts to his true form if he dies.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Mephistopheles' darkvision.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Mephistopheles regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Mephistopheles only dies if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and is unable to regenerate.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: Mephistopheles doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when he flies out of an enemy's reach.

HellfireMastery.name: Hellfire Mastery
HellfireMastery.description: Fire damage that Mephistopheles inflicts ignores resistances and immunities. Mephistopheles is immune to this effect.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Mephistopheles fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Mephistopheles has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mephistopheles makes three Ranseur attacks. He can replace one of the attacks with Hellfire Lash (if available).

Ranseur,+3.name: Ranseur,+3
Ranseur,+3.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing plus 18 (4d8) fire or cold damage (Mephistopheles' choice).

HellfireImplosion{@recharge4}.name: HellfireImplosion{@recharge4}
HellfireImplosion{@recharge4}.description: A bright streak of Hellfire appears at a point that Mephistopheles can see within 150 feet of him. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 31 (9d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

HellfireLash{@recharge5}.name: HellfireLash{@recharge5}
HellfireLash{@recharge5}.description: Mephistopheles unleashes a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide lash of Hellfire that ignites a 5-foot-radius sphere around where it strikes. Any targets in the area of effect must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

Boo,TheMiniatureGiantSpaceHamster.name: Boo, The Miniature Giant Space Hamster
Boo,TheMiniatureGiantSpaceHamster.description: Boo is Minsc's animal companion. Boo is a miniature giant space hamster and has the statistics of a rat.

FavoredEnemy.name: Favored Enemy
FavoredEnemy.description: Minsc's favored enemy is evil. When he hits an evil creature with a melee attack he deals an additional 7 (2d6) slashing damage.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of his turn, Minsc may choose to gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Minsc makes two Greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During his first turn, Montaron has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Montaron scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Montaron is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Montaron instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

Nimbleness.name: Nimbleness
Nimbleness.description: Montaron can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

SneakAttack(1/Turn).name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
SneakAttack(1/Turn).description: Montaron deals an extra 21 (6d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Montaron that isn't incapacitated and Montaron doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Montaron possesses a bag of holding. He keeps the demilich, Xzar, in the bag. He also possesses a portable hole, which he uses to aid in robberies. As a bonus action, Montaron can place his portable hole in his bag of holding. This instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. Montaron and any creature within 10 feet of him is sucked through the gate to a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Montaron makes three Shortsword attacks and uses the ability Unleash the Demilich if available.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 9 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

UnleashtheDemilich(1/Day).name: UnleashtheDemilich(1/Day)
UnleashtheDemilich(1/Day).description: Montaron reaches inside his bag of holding and releases Xzar. Xzar is a demilich and appears within 5 feet of Montaron. Xzar rolls for his own initiative. Xzar can't use lair actions or legendary actions. He has a CR of 14.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.

CoronaofBeauty.name: CoronaofBeauty
CoronaofBeauty.description: Naes activates an aura of sunlight that lasts for 1 minute or until he dismisses it using an action. He emits bright light in a 60-foot-radius and dim light 30 feet beyond that. His enemies in the bright light have disadvantage on saving throws against any spell that deals fire or radiant damage.

RadiantBeautyofSune{@recharge4}.name: RadiantBeautyofSune{@recharge4}
RadiantBeautyofSune{@recharge4}.description: Naes dispels any magical darkness within 30 feet of him. Additionally, each hostile creature within 30 feet of Naes that does not have Cover||3||total cover must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 60 radiant damage on a failed saving throw, half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the saving throw has the blinded condition for 1 minute.

PotionMishap.name: Potion Mishap
PotionMishap.description: When Nauk uses the Imbibe Potion action more than once in an hour, roll 1d4 for what happens:

Relentless.name: Relentless
Relentless.description: When Nauk is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can drop to 1 hit point instead. He can't use this feature again for 24 hours

SpecialItems.name: Special Items
SpecialItems.description: Nauk wears adamantine plate armor. He wields a +1 maul and a +1 heavy crossbow which is already factored into his stats. He has 2 potion of cold resistance||potions of resistance (cold), 2 potion of fire resistance||potions of resistance (fire), 2 potion of lightning resistance||potions of resistance (lightning). He has 2 potion of heroism||potions of heroism and 4 potion of superior healing||potions of superior healing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Nauk makes three Magic Maul attacks. Nauk may substitute one of those attacks for the Imbibe Potion action.

MagicMaul.name: MagicMaul
MagicMaul.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, ranged 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

ImbibePotion.name: ImbibePotion
ImbibePotion.description: Nauk drinks a potion from the following list:

AuraofServileAvians.name: Aura of Servile Avians
AuraofServileAvians.description: Any evil creature with a natural fly speed and a CR of 20 or less must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw if they attempt to attack Pazuzu. A failed save means their action is wasted and the attack fails. On a successful saving throw the target is immune to this effect in the future.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Pazuzu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Pazuzu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Pazuzu makes two Greatsword or Talon attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

BreathWeapons{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapons{@recharge5}
BreathWeapons{@recharge5}.description: Pazuzu exhales poisonous acid in a 100-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Every creature hit by the acid must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this breath weapon melts and is disintegrated.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: Pelyious can hold his breath for 15 minutes.

bludgeoningdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsth.name: bludgeoning damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

piercingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: piercing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

slashingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridForm).name: Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridForm)
Multiattack(HumanoidorHybridForm).description: In Humanoid form, Pelyious makes two Scimitar attacks or two Hand Crossbow attacks. In hybrid form, he can substitute one Scimitar attack for a Bite attack.

Scimitar(HumanoidorHybridForm).name: Scimitar(HumanoidorHybridForm)
Scimitar(HumanoidorHybridForm).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridForm).name: HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridForm)
HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridForm).description: rw 6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Bite(HybridFormOnly).name: Bite(HybridFormOnly)
Bite(HybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 16) and until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Pelyious can't Bite another target.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Pelyious polymorphs into a crocodile-humanoid hybrid, or back into his true form, which is Humanoid. His statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. He reverts to his true form if he dies.

ArcaneSight.name: Arcane Sight
ArcaneSight.description: The phaerimm discerns the location of all magical auras within sight and knows which creatures within 60 feet are spellcasters.

ExtendedConcentration.name: Extended Concentration
ExtendedConcentration.description: The phaerimm can concentrate on two different spells at the same time. If concentration is broken, then both spells fade immediately.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The phaerimm is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The phaerimm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The phaerimm makes four Claw attacks and then makes a Bite or Stinger attack. Alternatively, it uses Spellcasting and then makes two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Stinger.name: Stinger
Stinger.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target fails a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, they have the paralyzed condition for 1 minute. The phaerimm's poison forces the paralyzed target to float 5 feet above the ground. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of it's turns.

Implant.name: Implant
Implant.description: The phaerimm makes a Stinger attack against a paralyzed target. If the stinger hits, an egg is implanted in the target. This egg can only be removed by spells that cure disease, such as lesser restoration. If the egg is not removed within 90 days, the larva emerges, and the host is killed. A phaerimm has a single egg so may only use this ability once.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Saemon wears a quiver of Ehlonna (holding handaxe|PHB|40 handaxes).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Saemon makes three Handaxe attacks.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Sarevok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Sarevok is killed he gains a new body in 24 hours, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears on the altar of the temple of Bhaal beneath Baldur's Gate. This ability ceases to function if a cleric of good alignment casts Hallow on the altar in the temple of Bhaal.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sarevok makes two Longsword attacks. He may replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage or 10 (1d10 + 5) if wielded in two hands. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be cursed by Bhaal. The cursed target can't regain hit points. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

Assassin'sStrike.name: Assassin'sStrike
Assassin'sStrike.description: Sarevok makes a Longsword attack. If he hits the target and has advantage on the attack roll, then he deals an additional 21 (6d6) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 10 minutes.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the shator's darkvision.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The shator has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The shator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The shator's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shator makes one Bite attack or one Poisonous Spit attack (if available) and then makes two Claws attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

PoisonousSpit{@recharge5}.name: PoisonousSpit{@recharge5}
PoisonousSpit{@recharge5}.description: The shator exhales poisonous spit in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save and having the paralyzed condition for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The sirene can breathe air and water.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The sirene has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sirene makes two Dagger attacks or two Shortbow attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Sirene'sSong(2/Day).name: Sirene'sSong(2/Day)
Sirene'sSong(2/Day).description: The sirene casts suggestion with a range of 1 mile that affects all creatures of the sirene's choosing in range. Each target has disadvantage on the saving throw.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: Any creature hostile to the skeleton lord that starts its turn within 20 feet of the skeleton lord must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, unless the skeleton lord is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, then the creature is immune to the skeleton lord's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The skeleton lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The skeleton lord's weapon attacks are magical and gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skeleton lord makes three Greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The skeleton warrior has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The skeleton warrior's weapon attacks are magical and gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skeleton warrior makes two Greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

AuraofMadness.name: Aura of Madness
AuraofMadness.description: Any creature (other than Undead or Constructs) that ends its turn within 10 feet of Ssendam must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be inflicted with a random short-term madness. If a creature succeeds against any madness ability of Ssendam's, they are immune to Ssendam's madness for 1 hour.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Ssendam fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Ssendam has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration(GoldenAmoebaFormOnly).name: Regeneration (Golden Amoeba Form Only)
Regeneration(GoldenAmoebaFormOnly).description: Ssendam regains 40 hit points at the start of her turn if she has at least 1 hit point.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ssendam makes three attacks: one with her Touch of Madness and two with her Chaos Staff.

TouchofMadness.name: TouchofMadness
TouchofMadness.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. A target that fails a DC 20 Charisma saving throw is inflicted with a random short-term madness. If it is already mad, the existing madness is replaced with a random long-term madness.

ChaosStaff.name: ChaosStaff
ChaosStaff.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

SummonSlaadi(1/Day).name: SummonSlaadi(1/Day)
SummonSlaadi(1/Day).description: Ssendam summons 1d4 + 1 death slaad||death slaadi. A summoned slaad appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Ssendam, acts as an ally of Ssendam, and can't summon other slaadi. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Ssendam dies, or until Ssendam dismisses it as an action.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Ssendam magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

YoungBronzeDragon.name: Young Bronze Dragon
YoungBronzeDragon.description: Suldil is accompanied by a young bronze dragon. The dragon allows Suldil to use him as a mount.

BronzeBolt.name: BronzeBolt
BronzeBolt.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) lightning damage.

Explosion(1/Day).name: Explosion(1/Day)
Explosion(1/Day).description: Suldil discharges a burst of energy in a 60-foot-radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) lightning damage on failed save, half as much damage on a successful save.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The sword spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: While in contact with a web, the sword spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The sword spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sword spider makes one Bite attack and two Foreleg attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and has the paralyzed condition while poisoned in this way.

Foreleg.name: Foreleg
Foreleg.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

JavelinExpert.name: Javelin Expert
JavelinExpert.description: Tasloi can use their Dexterity for attack and damage rolls with a javelin, just as if the javelin had the finesse property.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The tasloi can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Net.name: Net
Net.description: rw 5 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: The target has the restrained condition. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

JavelinExpert.name: Javelin Expert
JavelinExpert.description: Tasloi can use their Dexterity for attack and damage rolls with a javelin, just as if the javelin had the finesse property.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The tasloi can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Blowgun.name: Blowgun
Blowgun.description: rw 6 to hit, range 25/100 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1 + 4) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 hour.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: rw 6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Tiberius Inuus has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tiberius Inuus makes three Flame Tongue attacks.

FlameTongue.name: FlameTongue
FlameTongue.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

TouchofSune.name: TouchofSune
TouchofSune.description: Tiberius Inuus touches a creature. The target magically regains 40 hit points and is freed from any disease or poison.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Valygar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MageSlaying.name: Mage Slaying
MageSlaying.description: When Valygar deals damage to a creature that is concentration||concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Valygar makes two Katana attacks and one Hand Crossbow attack or he makes two Hand Crossbow attacks.

Katana.name: Katana
Katana.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

AnimalCompanions.name: Animal Companions
AnimalCompanions.description: Vellin is accompanied by Akela (wolf with 18 hit points). Vellin can mount or dismount Akela using 5 feet of movement. While mounted, Vellin can order Akela to Dash, Disengage, and Dodge. In addition, Vellin has an owl companion with 3 hit points. On Vellin's turn, the owl can perform a flyby on a creature of Vellin's choice. The next attack that Vellin makes against that creature has advantage.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Vellin has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

FiendSlayer.name: Fiend Slayer
FiendSlayer.description: When Vellin hits a Fiend with a weapon attack he deals an additional 7 (2d6) radiant damage.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: Vellin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Vellin wields a +1 shortsword (silvered) and a +1 shield.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Vellin makes three Silvered Shortsword attacks.

SilveredShortsword.name: SilveredShortsword
SilveredShortsword.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Viconia has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Viconia to sleep.

LivingShadow.name: Living Shadow
LivingShadow.description: While in dim light or darkness, Viconia has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Viconia wears a belt of giant strength (fire) and a cloak of protection and wields a +3 mace. Without the belt, her strength is 12 and her speed is reduced to 20 ft.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Viconia has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Viconia attacks twice with her Magic Mace and uses her Spellcasting action.

MagicMace.name: MagicMace
MagicMace.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (1d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

SacredCleansing{@recharge4}.name: SacredCleansing{@recharge4}
SacredCleansing{@recharge4}.description: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within 60 feet must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 28 (8d6) fire damage plus 28 (8d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Viktor has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

ShadowDragonCompanion.name: Shadow Dragon Companion
ShadowDragonCompanion.description: Viktor has a young gold shadow dragon that accompanies him at all times. If Viktor dies, the young gold shadow dragon returns to the Shadowfell.

SunBlade.name: Sun Blade
SunBlade.description: Viktor wields a sun blade. Viktor gains a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage (this is already factored into Viktor's stat block). When Viktor hits an Undead creature with this sword, that target takes an extra 4 (1d8) radiant damage. The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Viktor makes two Sun Blade attacks and one Raven's Whisper attack.

SunBlade.name: SunBlade
SunBlade.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) radiant damage or 11 (1d10 + 6) radiant damage if used with two hands.

Raven'sWhisper.name: Raven'sWhisper
Raven'sWhisper.description: rs 7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d10 + 3) radiant damage.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The wolfwere has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The wolfwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolfwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

bludgeoningdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsth.name: bludgeoning damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't iron

piercingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: piercing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't iron

slashingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't iron

Multiattack(Hybridformonly).name: Multiattack(Hybridformonly)
Multiattack(Hybridformonly).description: The wolfwere makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

Longsword(Humanoidformonly).name: Longsword(Humanoidformonly)
Longsword(Humanoidformonly).description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Bite(WolforHybridformonly).name: Bite(WolforHybridformonly)
Bite(WolforHybridformonly).description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Claws(Hybridformonly).name: Claws(Hybridformonly)
Claws(Hybridformonly).description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

LethargicSong(Humanoidformonly).name: LethargicSong(Humanoidformonly)
LethargicSong(Humanoidformonly).description: The wolfwere plays a magical melody on an instrument. Every Humanoid within 200 feet of the wolfwere that hears the melody must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be slowed for 10 minutes, as if the slow spell has been cast on them. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this wolfwere's melody for the next 24 hours.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The wolfwere polymorphs into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a Humanoid (elf or human), or back into its true form, which is a dire wolf. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The wolfwere has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The wolfwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolfwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

bludgeoningdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsth.name: bludgeoning damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't iron

piercingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: piercing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't iron

slashingdamagefromnonmagicalweaponsthata.name: slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't iron

Multiattack(Hybridformonly).name: Multiattack(Hybridformonly)
Multiattack(Hybridformonly).description: The wolfwere makes three attacks: one with its Bite and two with its Claws.

Longsword(Humanoidformonly).name: Longsword(Humanoidformonly)
Longsword(Humanoidformonly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage or 11 (1d10 + 6) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Bite(WolforHybridformonly).name: Bite(WolforHybridformonly)
Bite(WolforHybridformonly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Claws(Hybridformonly).name: Claws(Hybridformonly)
Claws(Hybridformonly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

LethargicSong(Humanoidformonly).name: LethargicSong(Humanoidformonly)
LethargicSong(Humanoidformonly).description: The wolfwere plays a magical melody on an instrument. Every Humanoid within 200 feet of the wolfwere that hears the melody must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be slowed for 10 minutes, as if the slow spell has been cast on them. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this wolfwere's melody for the next 24 hours.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The wolfwere polymorphs into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a Humanoid (elf or human), or back into its true form, which is a dire wolf. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Enchanter.name: Enchanter
Enchanter.description: When Xan casts hideous laughter, hold person, or suggestion, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Xan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Xan to sleep.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Xan wields a Moonblade. The Moonblade has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls (already factored into Xan's attacks) and has the finesse property.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Xan makes three Moonblade attacks.

Moonblade.name: Moonblade
Moonblade.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage or 11 (1d10 + 6) slashing damage if wielded with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) cold or fire damage (Xan's choice).

ChaosPhage.name: Chaos Phage
ChaosPhage.description: Xzar's infusion with the Chaos Phage gives him the following benefits:

GrimHarvest(1/Turn).name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
GrimHarvest(1/Turn).description: When Xzar kills a creature that is neither a Construct nor Undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, Xzar regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

NoSoul.name: No Soul
NoSoul.description: Since Xzar doesn't have a soul, resurrection magic is able to work upon him no matter how much time has passed. For example, the revivify spell would work on Xzar even a week after he died. However, spells like true resurrection and wish are unable to bring Xzar back to life if no body exists.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Xzar makes two Deprive attacks and uses Spellcasting.

Deprive.name: Deprive
Deprive.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) necrotic damage.

DeathEruption(1/Day).name: DeathEruption(1/Day)
DeathEruption(1/Day).description: Negative energy erupts from Xzar, intensified by the Chaos Phage. Any creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere around Xzar (but not including Xzar) must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 36 (8d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid killed by this ability rises at the start of Xzar's next turn as a zombie under his command.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the spider is motionless, has its eyes and mouth closed, and has its legs wrapped around its body at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the spider move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the spider is anything other than an asteroid.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the spider fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The spider doesn't require air.

blindsight.name: blindsight
blindsight.value: 120 ft. while the spider's eyes are closed

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spider makes two Web Strand attacks, uses Reel, and makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

WebStrand.name: WebStrand
WebStrand.description: rw 13 to hit, reach 120 ft., one creature. on hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 18). The web strand can be attacked and destroyed (AC 12; 20 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage). The spider can grapple up to six creatures at a time using its web strands.

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The spider pulls each creature grappled by it up to 60 feet straight toward itself.

Shutdown.name: Shutdown
Shutdown.description: If targeted by dispel magic, the horror must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The horror doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes one Bite attack and two Rotating Saw attacks, or it makes two Lightning Jolt attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

RotatingSaw.name: RotatingSaw
RotatingSaw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

LightningJolt.name: LightningJolt
LightningJolt.description: rs 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) lightning damage.

SpelljammingHelmInterface.name: SpelljammingHelmInterface
SpelljammingHelmInterface.description: The horror attaches to a spelljamming helm it can see within 5 feet of itself and attunes to the helm instantly. If another creature is already attuned to the helm, that creature's attunement to the helm ends when the horror's attunement begins. The horror can operate the helm even though it isn't a spellcaster. The horror can detach from the helm as a bonus action, which ends its attunement to the helm.

FarRealmParasite.name: Far Realm Parasite
FarRealmParasite.description: Inside the lich's torso dwells a wormlike parasite that contains the lich's soul. When the lich dies, it implodes into the parasite, which then vanishes into the Far Realm. In 2d4 days, the parasite causes the lich to reappear within 1d4 miles of where it died. If the lich died inside a magic circle cast to contain Undead, the lich instead reappears as an otyugh with all the lich's memories.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The lich doesn't need air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lich makes one Parasitic Tentacle attack or uses Spellcasting. The lich also uses Psychic Whisper twice.

ParasiticTentacle.name: ParasiticTentacle
ParasiticTentacle.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 25 (6d6 + 4) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. The poisoned target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The third time the target fails the save, the target dies and dissolves into a gibbering mouther that obeys the lich and uses the target's initiative.

PsychicWhisper.name: PsychicWhisper
PsychicWhisper.description: The lich targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 25 (6d6 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of the lich's next turn as incomprehensible whispers fill the target's mind.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The fractine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ScryingFocus.name: Scrying Focus
ScryingFocus.description: A spellcaster can use the fractine as a substitute focus when casting the scrying spell or similar magic, provided the spellcaster and the fractine are within 5 feet of each other.

Two-Dimensionality.name: Two-Dimensionality
Two-Dimensionality.description: The fractine can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but it takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The fractine doesn't require air, drink, or sleep.

ExtradimensionalTouch.name: ExtradimensionalTouch
ExtradimensionalTouch.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (8d6) force damage.

AirEnvelope.name: Air Envelope
AirEnvelope.description: If it has at least 1 hit point, the gadabout can generate an air envelope around itself when in a vacuum. This air envelope can sustain the gadabout and one other creature in its space indefinitely.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The gadabout doesn't require food or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gadabout makes two Branch attacks.

Branch.name: Branch
Branch.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

Wrap.name: Wrap
Wrap.description: The gadabout enters the space of a willing Medium or Small creature within 5 feet of itself and gently wraps its branches around the target. The target is grappled (escape DC 0). Any attempt by the target to escape the grapple causes the gadabout to use its reaction to move into the nearest unoccupied space. While grappled by the gadabout, the target determines where the gadabout moves on the gadabout's turns and accompanies the gadabout wherever it goes.

Burst.name: Burst
Burst.description: The goon balloon bursts when it drops to 0 hit points, releasing noxious gas in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Creatures in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The goon balloon doesn't require air, food, or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The goon balloon makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

ScintillatingEye.name: ScintillatingEye
ScintillatingEye.description: Magical, kaleidoscopic light emanates from one of the goon balloon's eyes as the goon balloon targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 6 (1d12) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the beast fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The beast deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The beast makes two Claw attacks and one Tusk attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (1d12 + 8) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Tusk.name: Tusk
Tusk.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

DisintegrationGaze{@recharge5}.name: DisintegrationGaze{@recharge5}
DisintegrationGaze{@recharge5}.description: The beast targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 70 (10d6 + 40) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this magical effect reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is disintegrated and leaves nothing behind, except a pile of ashes plus whatever equipment it was wearing or carrying.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The parasite doesn't require air or sleep.

Cling.name: Cling
Cling.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the parasite attaches to the target. While attached, the parasite can't make Cling attacks. The parasite can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. As an action, a creature within reach of the parasite can try to detach it, doing so with a successful DC 14 Strength check.

ConsumeLife.name: ConsumeLife
ConsumeLife.description: The parasite deals 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage to one creature it is physically attached to, provided that creature isn't a Construct or an Undead. The parasite regains hit points equal to the damage taken.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The star lancer doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Horn.name: Horn
Horn.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the star lancer moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

InvisibilityCloak(3/Day).name: InvisibilityCloak(3/Day)
InvisibilityCloak(3/Day).description: The star lancer and one creature riding it (chosen by the star lancer) magically turn invisible. This effect lasts until the star lancer or a creature riding it attacks or casts a spell, or until the star lancer's concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment worn or carried by the invisible creatures is also invisible for the duration of the Invisibility Cloak.

Cavities.name: Cavities
Cavities.description: The yggdrasti has 1d4 + 2 cavities in its trunk. Each cavity is big enough to hold one Medium creature, two Small creatures, or eight Tiny creatures. A creature inside a cavity has Cover||3||three-quarters cover against attacks and other effects that originate outside the cavity. The yggdrasti's cavities aren't connected to one another.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the yggdrasti is motionless and rooted in the ground at the start of combat, it looks just like a dead tree and has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the rooted yggdrasti move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the yggdrasti is animate.

LightningConduit.name: Lightning Conduit
LightningConduit.description: If the yggdrasti is subjected to lightning damage, it is unhurt, and the lightning damage is instead divided evenly among all creatures it is grappling. In addition, the yggdrasti regains one use of Lightning Discharge.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The yggdrasti doesn't require air or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yggdrasti makes two Root attacks and uses Lightning Discharge (if available).

Root.name: Root
Root.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The yggdrasti has four roots, each of which can grapple one target.

LightningDischarge(3/Day).name: LightningDischarge(3/Day)
LightningDischarge(3/Day).description: The yggdrasti shoots lightning at one creature within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

GhastlyVisions.name: Ghastly Visions
GhastlyVisions.description: Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the dream eater must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is frightened of the dream eater until the start of the creature's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to this dream eater's Ghastly Visions trait for the next 24 hours.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The dream eater can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dream eater has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dream eater makes two Ensnaring Shriek attacks.

EnsnaringShriek.name: EnsnaringShriek
EnsnaringShriek.description: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) psychic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the dream eater.

CalescentAura.name: Calescent Aura
CalescentAura.description: At the start of Ember's turn, Ember can force any number of creatures of his choice within 10 feet of himself to make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 (2d6) fire damage and is frightened of Ember until the start of its next turn.

LegendaryResistance(5/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(5/Day).description: If Ember fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: In battle, Ember dons magical plate armor custom-forged for his use. While wearing the armor, Ember adds his Charisma modifier to his weapon damage rolls (included in the attack descriptions), and his AC can't be lower than 20.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ember makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (2d10 + 15) piercing damage plus 13 (2d6 + 6) fire damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (2d6 + 15) slashing damage.

FirestormBreath{@recharge5}.name: FirestormBreath{@recharge5}
FirestormBreath{@recharge5}.description: Ember exhales roiling flames and ash in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 56 (16d6) fire damage and is pushed up to 30 feet away from Ember and knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage with no other effects. If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by this effect, the creature immediately dies, and its body is reduced to ash.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the Forest Master fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The Forest Master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MasterofBeasts.name: Master of Beasts
MasterofBeasts.description: The Forest Master can comprehend and communicate with any Beast, even if the Beast knows no languages.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Forest Master makes either two Hooves attacks, two Moon Bolt attacks, or one of each.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

MoonBolt.name: MoonBolt
MoonBolt.description: rs 7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) radiant damage.

Duty-Bound.name: Duty-Bound
Duty-Bound.description: The foresworn is bound to enacting a singular duty it pledged itself to in life. While this duty is incomplete, whenever the foresworn is destroyed, it re-forms at its previous location after 3 (1d6) days, with all its hit points restored.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The foresworn can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The foresworn doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The foresworn makes three Spectral Polearm attacks.

SpectralPolearm.name: SpectralPolearm
SpectralPolearm.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The seeker uses Augment Physicality, if available, and makes two Crystal Blade attacks.

CrystalBlade.name: CrystalBlade
CrystalBlade.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) force damage, plus 7 (2d6) force damage if the seeker is Large.

AugmentPhysicality(1/Day).name: AugmentPhysicality(1/Day)
AugmentPhysicality(1/Day).description: For 1 minute, the seeker magically heightens its physical ability and increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While augmented, the seeker is Large, and makes Strength and Dexterity saving throws with advantage. If the seeker lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

ChangeShape(1/Day).name: ChangeShape(1/Day)
ChangeShape(1/Day).description: The seeker magically transforms to look and feel like a Medium Humanoid it has seen. Any equipment the seeker is wearing or carrying isn't transformed, and the seeker's statistics don't change. The seeker reverts to its true form if the seeker is reduced to 0 hit points or if the seeker uses an action to end the transformation.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The veil keeper uses Augment Physicality, if available, and makes two Mirage Flare attacks.

MirageFlare.name: MirageFlare
MirageFlare.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the veil keeper until the start of the veil keeper's next turn. While charmed in this way, a creature is incapacitated as it is beset by hypnotic, illusory visions.

AugmentPhysicality(1/Day).name: AugmentPhysicality(1/Day)
AugmentPhysicality(1/Day).description: For 1 minute, the veil keeper magically obscures it location, heightens its physical ability, and increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While the veil keeper is augmented, attack rolls against it have disadvantage, it is Large, and it makes Strength and Dexterity saving throws with advantage. If the veil keeper lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. These augmentations end if the veil keeper is incapacitated.

ChangeShape(3/Day).name: ChangeShape(3/Day)
ChangeShape(3/Day).description: The veil keeper magically transforms to look and feel like a Medium Humanoid it has seen. Any equipment the veil keeper is wearing or carrying isn't transformed, and the veil keeper's statistics don't change. The veil keeper reverts to its true form if the veil keeper is reduced to 0 hit points or if the veil keeper uses an action to end the transformation.

AlwaysThinkingAhead.name: Always Thinking Ahead
AlwaysThinkingAhead.description: The inventor has advantage on initiative rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The inventor makes two Flying Fangtrap attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Thunderscream Gadget if it's available.

FlyingFangtrap.name: FlyingFangtrap
FlyingFangtrap.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of the inventor's next turn.

ThunderscreamGadget{@recharge5}.name: ThunderscreamGadget{@recharge5}
ThunderscreamGadget{@recharge5}.description: The inventor produces a gadget that emits a screeching wave of sound in a 30-foot cone originating from the inventor. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) thunder damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

AlwaysThinkingAhead.name: Always Thinking Ahead
AlwaysThinkingAhead.description: The mastermind has advantage on initiative rolls.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The mastermind can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check. This trait doesn't function if the mastermind is grappling creatures in both of its clockwork claws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mastermind makes two Clockwork Claw attacks. The mastermind can replace one of these attacks with Generate Gadget if it's available.

ClockworkClaw.name: ClockworkClaw
ClockworkClaw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 10 (3d6) piercing damage at the start of each of the mastermind's turns. The mastermind has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

GenerateGadget{@recharge5}.name: GenerateGadget{@recharge5}
GenerateGadget{@recharge5}.description: The mastermind quickly assembles a clockwork gadget, producing one of the following effects (the mastermind's choice):

Chattergrab.name: Chattergrab
Chattergrab.description: Parts of this gadget look like gnashing metal teeth. This gadget hurtles toward a creature the mastermind can see within 60 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 31 (7d8) piercing damage and be incapacitated until the start of the mastermind's next turn.

Phasmoball.name: Phasmoball
Phasmoball.description: The mastermind launches this gadget to a point the mastermind can see within 30 feet of itself, where the gadget unleashes a cloud of mind-warping gases in a 10-foot-radius sphere. Each creature within the sphere must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage and be frightened of the mastermind until the start of the mastermind's next turn.

Thunderscream.name: Thunderscream
Thunderscream.description: This gadget emits a screeching wave of sound in a 30-foot cone originating from the mastermind. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) thunder damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The hunter can hold its breath for up to 10 minutes.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The hunter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hunter's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hunter makes one Bone Harpoon attack and one Tusk attack.

BoneHarpoon.name: BoneHarpoon
BoneHarpoon.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage. {@hom}The harpoon returns to the hunter's hand.

Tusk.name: Tusk
Tusk.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The draconian has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

ControlledFall.name: Controlled Fall
ControlledFall.description: If the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 50 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: If the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body erupts into sludge that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. Each creature within that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in the sludge for 1 minute. While covered in the sludge, a creature's speed is halved. A creature can use its action to scrape the sludge off itself or another creature within 5 feet of itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

FlamingCarnage{@recharge5}.name: FlamingCarnage{@recharge5}
FlamingCarnage{@recharge5}.description: The draconian indulges its rage, wreathing itself in fire and moving up to its speed. The draconian can enter creatures' spaces during this move. During this movement, when the draconian enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) fire damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is pushed to the nearest space out of the draconian's path. A creature can be affected by this draconian's Flaming Carnage only once during a turn.

DraconicCommand.name: Draconic Command
DraconicCommand.description: Whenever a Dragon or a creature with the Draconic Devotion trait within 30 feet of Verminaard makes an attack roll, the creature can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Verminaard fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Verminaard wears +2 plate armor and wields the mace Nightbringer|MCV2DC, which grants him darkvision as well as immunity to fire damage and to the charmed and frightened conditions (included above).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Verminaard makes two Nightbringer attacks and uses Malediction.

Nightbringer.name: Nightbringer
Nightbringer.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (4d4) radiant damage. If the target is a creature, the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of Verminaard's next turn.

Malediction.name: Malediction
Malediction.description: Verminaard utters an unholy word, causing profane fire to descend on one creature Verminaard can see within 60 feet of himself. The creature must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) necrotic damage plus 11 (2d10) radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

BlazeRod.name: Blaze Rod
BlazeRod.description: When the blaze drops to 0 hit points, it disappears in a cloud of smoke and has a 50 percent chance of leaving behind a glowing rod worth 100 gp. The rod sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. As an action, a creature can try to snap the rod, doing so with a successful DC 14 Strength check. The snapped rod releases its fiery energy in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6 (1d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

HeatAura.name: Heat Aura
HeatAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the blaze takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The blaze sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

WaterSusceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
WaterSusceptibility.description: The blaze takes 1 cold damage for every 5 feet it moves in water, for every gallon of water splashed on it, or whenever it starts its turn in the rain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blaze makes three Fiery Doom attacks.

FieryDoom.name: FieryDoom
FieryDoom.description: ms,rs 6 to hit; reach 5 ft. or ranged 60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) fire damage, and the target catches fire if it's a creature or a flammable object. Until a creature takes an action to extinguish the fire, the burning target takes 3 (1d6) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

BizarrePhysiology.name: Bizarre Physiology
BizarrePhysiology.description: The creeper can't take actions except for Dash, Disengage, Hide, and Search. It can't take bonus actions or reactions.

CreeperHead.name: Creeper Head
CreeperHead.description: When a creeper drops to 0 hit points from a charged creeper's explosion (see the Destruction trait), it dies and its head falls off. A creeper's fallen head is hollow and can be worn as a mask with eye and mouth openings.

Destruction.name: Destruction
Destruction.description: When it ends its turn within 10 feet of a Humanoid that it can see, the creeper stops moving and emits a hiss loud enough to be heard by creatures within 30 feet of itself.

ElectricalCharge.name: Electrical Charge
ElectricalCharge.description: Whenever the creeper is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead becomes charged for 1 minute. While charged, the creeper emits dim blue light in a 5-foot radius.

FearofFelines.name: Fear of Felines
FearofFelines.description: The creeper has the frightened condition whenever it starts its turn within 60 feet of a feline creature it can see. The condition lasts until the start of the creeper's next turn.

DragonEgg.name: Dragon Egg
DragonEgg.description: When the Ender Dragon drops to 0 hit points, it radiates beams of purple light and then disappears, leaving behind an inert, jet-black dragon egg worth 5,000 gp.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and uses Beating Wings.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit; reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

BeatingWings.name: BeatingWings
BeatingWings.description: The dragon beats its great wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (1d4 + 8) bludgeoning damage, be pushed 10 feet away from the dragon, and have the prone condition.

HarmfulBreath{@recharge5}.name: HarmfulBreath{@recharge5}
HarmfulBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales putrid gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 (15d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then chooses a point it can see where the cone makes contact with the ground. That point becomes the center of a 10-foot-high, 10-foot-radius cylinder of lingering gas that disappears at the start of the dragon's next turn. Any creature that starts its turn in the cylinder takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

EvasiveTeleportation.name: Evasive Teleportation
EvasiveTeleportation.description: Whenever it takes damage or is the target of a ranged attack, the Enderman can teleport, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 20 feet of itself (no action required). If this effect is triggered by a ranged attack, the Enderman teleports just before the attack hits, causing the attack to miss it. This trait is suppressed while the Enderman has the incapacitated condition.

Implosion.name: Implosion
Implosion.description: When the Enderman drops to 0 hit points, it dies as its body implodes. Roll a d10. On a roll of 9 or less, the Enderman leaves no remains. On a roll of 10, the Enderman leaves behind a glowing, purple orb called an Ender pearl, worth 500 gp. A creature can throw the pearl up to 60 feet; if the pearl lands in an unoccupied space big enough to contain the creature, the creature teleports to that space, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and the pearl disappears.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the Enderman has disadvantage on attack rolls.

WaterSusceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
WaterSusceptibility.description: The Enderman takes 1 cold damage for every 5 feet it moves in water, for every gallon of water splashed on it, or whenever it starts its turn in the rain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Enderman makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit; reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit; reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the archon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes one Hooves attack and one Radiant Lance attack.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

RadiantLance.name: RadiantLance
RadiantLance.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 28 (8d6) radiant damage, and the target is marked until the start of the archon's next turn. While it is marked, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the archon.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the wurm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the wurm move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the wurm is animate.

LeafyHandholds.name: Leafy Handholds
LeafyHandholds.description: Creatures have advantage on ability checks made to climb the wurm.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the wurm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The wurm regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the wurm takes fire or lightning damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wurm's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wurm makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (5d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature has the restrained condition, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 28 (8d6) piercing damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns from thorns in the wurm's gullet.

MountedAdept.name: Mounted Adept
MountedAdept.description: While mounted and without the incapacitated condition, the rider has advantage on melee attack rolls against any unmounted creature smaller than its mount, the rider and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and the rider can force an attack targeted at its mount to target the rider instead.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the rider to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the rider drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The rider makes two Axe attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Fell Glare.

Axe.name: Axe
Axe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

FellGlare.name: FellGlare
FellGlare.description: The rider gazes at a creature within 30 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the rider, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The witch makes two Poison Dagger attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Spellcasting.

PoisonDagger.name: PoisonDagger
PoisonDagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

PolymorphConcoction(1/Day).name: PolymorphConcoction(1/Day)
PolymorphConcoction(1/Day).description: The witch hurls a bottle of liquid at a point up to 20 feet away from itself, which shatters into a cloud of magical smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or transform into a creature, as if under the effects of a polymorph spell, transforming into one of the following forms (roll a d4): 1, bat; 2, frog; 3, lizard; or 4, rat. This transformation lasts for 1 hour or until the creature drops to 0 hit points in its new form.

ShatteredShards.name: ShatteredShards
ShatteredShards.description: The witch targets a point it can see within 30 feet of itself. The air there magically solidifies into a mirrorlike pane, then shatters in a 15-foot cone originating from that point. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 25 (10d4) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The faerie doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

NeedleBlade.name: NeedleBlade
NeedleBlade.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

MagicMockery.name: MagicMockery
MagicMockery.description: The faerie hurls magical taunts at one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 3 (1d6) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the faerie's next turn.

FaerieIllumination.name: Faerie Illumination
FaerieIllumination.description: The faerie sheds dim light in a 15-foot radius.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The faerie makes two Shining Strike attacks.

ShiningStrike.name: ShiningStrike
ShiningStrike.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d6) radiant damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be wreathed in light until the end of the faerie's next turn. While a creature is wreathed in light, attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature can't benefit from the invisible condition.

Stingblade.name: Stingblade
Stingblade.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage. If the faerie had advantage on the attack roll, the target takes an additional 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

TheftofNerves(1/Day).name: TheftofNerves(1/Day)
TheftofNerves(1/Day).description: The faerie unleashes a burst of mind-muddling magic in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or have the frightened condition for 1 minute.
